chinese: 老耿端起枪，眯缝起一只三角眼，一搂扳机响了枪，冰雹般的金麻雀劈哩啪啦往下落，铁砂子在柳枝间飞迸着，嚓嚓有声。
english: Old Geng picked up his shotgun, squinted, and pulled the trigger. Two sparrows crashed to the ground like hailstones as shotgun pellets tore noisily through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit:
Old Teng raised his gun, closing his eyes and gripping a triangular eye. A boom of bullets rang out as he fired one, like thunder crashing down. The hammering sound of steel stones echoed through the branches of the trees. 

The noise was so loud that it made my heart beat faster.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng raised his rifle, squinted his triangular eye, and fired – a gun, like a ladle, crackled as the shot fell down towards him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Old Geer lifted his gun, squinting one eye as he pulled the trigger. A hail of bullets rained down from his rifle. Golden sparrows plopped down from the trees, sandstones flying through the willows, making a clattering sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Geng raised the pistol to his eye, squeezed the trigger, and some of the shot flew straight into the sky, like ice pellets, as spattered tin shells burst against the willows.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Old耿举起枪，眯着眼睛，枪声轰鸣，子弹砰砰砰地落在地上，一颗颗冰雹般的大鸟扑棱棱地落在柳树之间，咔嚓一声。
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng raised his rifle and tilted his head, clasping the trigger, and a crash of iron shrapnel fell beside him, splashing over time boundaries and scattering like ice rain.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Old Geer lifted his gun, squinted one of his eyes, clutched it, and fired off a shot like hail of golden sparrows, sand grains flying from the willows, making a sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng raised his gun, squinted, and emptied it. The cocoon of bullets split open as they flew, like ice pellets, until it was gone, sending chiseling sounds tumbling through the air as iron seeds smashed pruneflower stems.

chinese: 次日天未明时，刘老老便起来梳洗了， 又将板儿教了几句话； 五六岁的孩子，听见带了他进城逛去，喜欢的无不应承。
english: Next day Grannie Liu was up before dawn. As soon as she had washed and done her hair, she set about teaching Ban-er a few words to say to the ladies at the great house – an exercise to which he submitted cheerfully enough, as would any little boy of four or five who had been promised an outing to the great city.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The next morning at six o'clock in the morning, Liu Geogao rose up and washed his face, as he had told him a few words about his daughter. Five years old children heard him coming out of his house, and all agreed that they should be taken care of by him.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But not till very early in the day did Grannie Liu rise up from her bed to prepare herself; she would have insisted on more梳妆的时候，但听到板儿反复地说过以下词儿： "要到城里逛逛，城里的商场哪儿好玩，就去哪儿玩。"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The next morning, before dawn, Liu Lao got up and washed himself; he also taught the boy a few words. Five or six-year-old children like to go to the city with him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In the early hours of the morning she rose and began her grooming, reminding Ban-er of a few words to say on their visit. By the time they set out for their destination Ban-er was so excited that he practically agreed to carry them all the way to the market.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The next day morning when the sun was still rising, Liu Geogon got up and washed himself. He taught him a few words of Mandarin; five-year-olds who heard him speak were all willing to take him along with them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): First thing that morning the old lady did rise up from her bed was to go over and straighten herself up before going out again; then she had Trinket read his letter-to-x, and had him repeat the words he wanted him to remember by very loud voices; then she told him how it was intended to take its place as a guide-post in the new city; and then, when the two of them was back in their own quarters once more, she told her what she had said to Grannie Liu.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The next morning, Liu Langlang got up early and washed her face; she taught him a few words too. A five-year-old child liked to go with his father to the city.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the predawn light she arose, dressed, and began preparing a message to be delivered to Tangys' quarters. She instructed Ban-er in a few phrases of Mandarin and left him with a passion for the journey ahead. A five-year-old boy was happy to agree to go anywhere as long as he was not taken on a long trip.

chinese: 钱老板道：“是，是，多谢香主。” 在一张椅上坐了，续道：“属下将小郡主藏在猪肚里带进宫来，一来是为瞒过宫门侍卫的重重搜检，二来是要瞒过沐王府众人的耳目。
english: 'Thank you, Master,' said Butcher Qian, seating himself in one of the chairs and continuing. 'There were really two reasons why I hid the Little Countessinside this pig's carcass. One was to get her past the Palace Guard: they always search everyone at the gate. But it was also to get her past any of the Mu Family spies who might be out watching for us.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Money boss said, 'Yes, yes, thank you.' He sat on a chair and continued: "The underling will take the little princesses in the pig stomach and bring them into the palace. One is for hiding from the imperial guards and the other is to hide from the ladies of the court.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If your highness likes,' said the butcher, 'I'll make a little刍婢躲入猪肚之中,要以防主人用刀子狠命劈去,要他观瞧后门的卫士们严加搜索,也要躲着他家众多忠心相候的小太监的目光。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Mr. Qin said, "Yes, yes, thank you very much." He sat on a chair and continued, "My lord will hide our young lady in the pig stomach, so that we can avoid the thorough searches of the palace guards and the ears of the沐 Halls' people."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Of course,' said Butcher Qian politely, sitting down in a chair and continuing: 'I brought her here the day she was captured. First of all, of course, to avoid the searches made by the guards at the Palace Gate; and secondly, to avoid arousing the attention of the Mu folk.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Money man said, 'Yes, yes, thank you.' He sat down on a chair and continued: "The servant of the lord brought his lady to be hidden in a pig's stomach in the palace. One reason was to hide from the guards who checked the gate of the palace, another was to hide from the people at the palace's court."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Allow me to introduce the butcher,' said Butcher Qian, sitting down on a seat at one side of the doorway. 'We've been hiding her in the pig's gut inside the gate of our palace, so far as the guards and the people within know, it's to help them search the gates; and also to help you and the Mu lords avoid those little troopers of theirs—well, that's what we call it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Qin said, "Yes, yes, thank you very much." He sat down on a chair and continued, "My subordinate brought the little princess into the palace secretly, first to avoid the thorough searches of the guards at the gate, secondly to hide her from the ears of the沐王府众人."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course,' said Butcher Qian melodramatically. 'I'd do anything for my Master! I hid her in one of the pigs' tumours so that we couldn't be searched by the Palace stewards; and to keep them from hearing about her.

chinese: 但已经晚了，物理学家静静地躺在地上，半睁的双眼看着从他的头颅上流出的血迹，疯狂的会场瞬间陷入了一片死寂。
english: But it was already too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, his eyes still open as blood oozed from his head. The frenzied crowd sank into silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: But it was too late; physicist lay on his feet, half closed his eyes as he watched the blood that flowed from his head, a chaotic scene swept across the stage instantaneously.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But already it was too late: the physicist lay peacefully on the ground, his eyes open only half-opened. The blood that flowed down his head dried up immediately, and the chaotic meeting became another killing cry.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: But it was too late. Physicists lay quietly on the ground, half open eyes staring at the bloodstains flowing from his head, the mad meeting immediately plunged into a dead silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But it was too late. The physicist lay motionless on the floor, half open eyes following the blood flowing from his skull. The frenzied crowd suddenly fell into an eternal silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But it's too late, the physicist lay on his hands and half open eyes watching as his head was dripping with blood. The dead silence of the crowd instantly enveloped him.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But already too late: the physicist was dead, sprawled on the floor, his eyes open only half-opened watching the blood that flowed from his head turn into oneingletonhell.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But it was too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, half-opened eyes looking at the bloodstains dripping from his head, the frenzied gathering instantly plunged into a dead silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But it was too late. The physicist lay quietly on the floor, half open. His eyes watched the blood flowing from his forehead. The frenzied crowd suddenly fell into an instant silence.

chinese: 但这时，绍琳却做出了一件出人意料的事，与一位受迫害的教育部高干结了婚，当时那名高干还在干校住“牛棚”劳改中。

chinese: 湘云道：“你敢挑宝姐姐的短处，就算你是个好的。”

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): No one can ever complain because you have picked on her,' said Xiang-yun. 'Even if you were a nice girl, it would still be worth while.'

chinese: 海老公问起今日做了什么事，韦小宝说了到鳌拜家中抄家，至于吞没珍宝、金银、匕首等事，自然绝口不提，最后道：“太后命我到鳌拜家里拿两部《四十二章经》……”
english: When Old Hai asked what he had been doing that day, Trinket told him that he had been helping supervise the confiscation of Oboi's estate. He concluded his account—which of course omitted any mention of the dagger and various other valuables that he had pocketed for himself—by telling him about the two copies of the Sutra in Forty-Two Sections that had been discovered in Oboi's house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Qian Pei asked what he did today. Wen Xiaoping said that he was sent to the house of the emperor and took away all the jewels, silver, and daggers. Naturally, no mention was made of those things." Finally, he said: "The Empress太后 gave me two volumes of the Four Twenty-Seven Chapter Book."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The old eunuch asked what he had done that day. Trinket answered him that he had gone to Oboi's house to take away all the properties of the Empress Dowager. As he did not want to mention the two volumes of the Forty-Two Sections Sutra that he had taken from Chu Bai, he went on to say that 'Her Ladyship had ordered me to take a book of the Four-Times Chapter Texts from He Yu.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Kangxi asked about what he did today, and Huagong said that he went to抄家鳌拜家中，至于吞没珍宝、金银、匕首等事，当然绝口不提，最后说：“皇太后让我去鳌拜家里取两部《四十二章经》……”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Old Hai asked what he had been up to that day. Trinket told him he'd gone to Oboi's home and helped out the officials searching for treasure. He didn't mention the gaggle of gold and silver chisels, or the couple of copies of the Sutra in four parts that he had actually snatched. The old eunuch ended his question by asking, 'And what did the Empress Dowager tell you to do when you got there?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The old man of heaven asked him what he did today. Weiqi Baogang said that he had gone to the home of the Emperor to steal and plunder treasures, gold, silver, and knives, all of which were not mentioned at all. Finally, he said, "My mother gave me two copies of the Four Twenty-Two Book."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After plucking a few moments' particulars from the old eunuch's collar, Trinket finally withdrew to his room, where he told him what he had stolen from Oboi: 'I went to see the Empress Dowager Wang and she gave me these books on Thursday... .'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Hai Gou asked about what he did today, and Hu Xiaopang said that he went to a house belonging to Aobai, and then he swallowed precious things, gold, swords and so on. He naturally did not mention it. Finally, he said, "Empress Dowager ordered me to get two copies of the Fourty-two Chapters."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch started the conversation by reviewing his recent actions, starting with what he had done today: visiting Oboi's residence and helping himself to treasures. He made it clear that he was not going to mention the knives and coins he'd swallowed. 'The Empress Dowager sent me to Oboi's place to get two copies of the Sutra in Forty-Two Sections . . .'

chinese: 不过属下胆大妄为，事先没向韦香主请示，擅自将小郡主带进宫来，给韦香主增添不少危险，不少麻烦，实在该死之极。”
english: Of course, it was rather a nerve, taking it on myself to bring the Little Countess in here without consulting you. It means a lot of danger for you, Master. And trouble. I deserve to be hung.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: But his subordinates were bold and rash, not even consulting him before they brought Lady Huānshǐ in as a guest of honor. They added more trouble and inconvenience to this, and it was too bad that he had gone so far."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But I took the initiative, didn't I? I've no reason for believing that he'd sought my advice before taking him in. He's now become a great danger to Lady Wang, with so many complications that it seems as if the Devil himself is involved.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: However, my subordinates were bold and reckless. They didn’t ask for permission from Master Wen before taking the young lady into the palace, which added many dangers and troubles to her. I’m really sorry.”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I realized how dangerous it was for you and myself when I took your little郡主进来 without first asking you, so I'm sorry.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But the subordinate was bold and rash, without consulting him before he brought Xiao Hongmao into the palace, adding more danger and trouble to his heart. The matter is beyond this point."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But I thought it was too risky not to ask you first before coming here. I deserve death for what I did.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: However, my subordinates are foolish enough to act recklessly without consulting Master Wei beforehand. They have brought danger and trouble to Master Wei by bringing the young lady to the palace, and I am truly deserving of death for this.”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was rather bold of me to take the Little Countess in without asking first, and causing you so much trouble. I stand absolutely guilty as acrimony.'

chinese: 是以贾环等都不甚怕他，只因怕贾母不依，才只得让他三分。
english: The latter – Jia Huan included – reciprocated with a healthy disrespect only slightly tempered by their fear of his doting grandmother.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: So, because none of them were afraid of him, only because he was afraid that his mother would not agree, he had to give him a third.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: This was why each of them, including Jia Huan, was not very afraid of him; but it was because Grandmother Jia didn't like him that he was given a partial run for his rights.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Because all of them were not afraid of him, but only because they were afraid that Jia Baobao would not be pleased if he refused, they had to let him off with a concession.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The rest of the boys in the house, however, took their advice (although they themselves would never have dreamed of disputing with Jia Huan) and made no further attempts to provoke him, but all looked very wary of Jia Rui should he make any such attempt in his absence.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Thus, none of his relatives fear him, but for fear that he is not liked by the mother-in-law, he has given him a third share.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): This was why there was no fear on all sides that Grandmother Jia might refuse to give him a dime; but it was because they thought she would prefer someone else to arraign him that he was granted so few concessions.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Because none of them were afraid of him, they only feared that if it was not allowed by his mother, he would have no choice but to give him a little bit of face.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): So that even though he was the Duke of Guanghui's favorite, Jia Huan, like the others, knew not to anger his 'goddess' by crossing himself, but he had to restrain his contempt for her: otherwise there would be no one stronger than he was to keep him in check.

chinese: 到潮退时我也安息，但潮兴时要乘兴而舞。
english: When the wave receded, I would rest calmly, but I wanted to dance while the wave was at its peak.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I would rest peacefully after the tide went out, but when the next high water rush came, I would舞得兴冲冲。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: When the tide goes out I will rest, but when it comes in I will dance with pleasure.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When the tide went down, I would relax; but when it was rising, I had to dance with joy.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: As I retire, I will rest, but when the tide is on it, I shall dance.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'd want to rest after the sea returned back常态, but then I have to ride out each wave with a big grin.

chinese: 钱老板接了过来，在猪背上一划，没料到这匕首锋利无匹，割猪肉如切豆腐，一剑下去，直没至柄。
english: Butcher Qian took it from him and made an incision in the back of the pig's carcass. Unaware of the blade's incomparable sharpness, he was somewhat surprised at the ease with which it sank in, at once burying itself up to the hilt and slicing through fat and flesh as if it were bean curd.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The money man accepted it with a flourish on his pig’s back, but when he cut it, he was surprised by how sharp it was – cutting pork like peeling a tomato. The knife went straight through its handle.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Mr. Qin took it over, slicing the pig's back, not expecting the knife to be so sharp that he could cut the pork as easily as cutting tofu, straight down through the handle.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Money owner took the knife, then cut his pig on top of it. He didn't expect that this sword was so sharp that it could slice pork like a piece of tofu. Just one blow and he couldn’t get past the blade.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The butcher took the dagger with both hands and slashed it in the centre, sending the mixed foodstuff within intact, even slicing the top off, as he went.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Yuan took it from him, cut at the back of the pig, not expecting the dagger to be as sharp as a knife, cutting pork like cutting tofu, slicing all the way down to the hilt.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Butcher Qian took the knife from him and made a stab. He had no idea how sharp it was; the result was as he would have hoped: the刀割肉如同切豆腐, right up to the handle.

chinese: 山上有一股风，无声无息地吹下去。 天地间充满了悲惨的气氛。
english: A current of wind slipped down the mountain without a sound, without a breath, and a sadness in the air filled every space between the sky and the earth.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: On the mountain a wind of lamentable quality blows by, blowing with undulations across the vast expanse of the sky.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: There is a wind on the mountain, blowing silently and without sound. The sky is filled with miserable atmosphere.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: On the mountain wind blows silently and endlessly. The whole world is filled with a tragic atmosphere.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There was a wind blowing silently up and down the mountain, as if sending with its winds of despair the scattered particles of heaven and earth.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There is a wind on the mountain, blowing silently and unnoticeably. The world around them is filled with sorrow.

chinese: 宝玉笑道：“只从那个月见了你，我叫你往书房里来，谁知接接连连许多事情，就把你忘了。”
english: 'After I invited you round to my study that day,' said Bao-yu, 'a whole lot of things seemed to happen one after the other, and I'm afraid I quite forgot about your visit.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Qingyu said, 'Only from that time I met you, I called you to the study. How many things did you forget after all?'"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Bao-yu smiled. 'It all started with that month! I used to tell you I wanted you to come back to my study, but many things that came rushing up all at once made it hard for me to keep track of them all.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Jia Baoyu said, "I have just seen you that month. I asked you to go to the study, but it is all connected with many things. You were forgotten."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: From that time,' said Bao-yu, 'when I first saw you that month, you were the talk of the house; so many things have happened since then that I have been忙着 dealing with them that I can't remember ever seeing you.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qian Guan said, 'I called you to the study when I saw you on that month. How many things happened after that, did you forget me?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): From the very beginning I wasn't much help to you,' said Bao-yu, laughing. 'The month you saw me first meant very soon enough that I was unable to keep up with all the happenings and it was no use trying to remember them all.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jia Baoyu said, "I only remembered you after seeing you that month. I was so busy with many things that I forgot about you."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Bao-yu smiled: 'Since that time I didn't see you any more until the first time I saw you a month ago. You will remember, though, that a great number of things happened during that month before you came back here.'

chinese: “既然是叶老师交待的，就观测吧，反正也不费劲，百分之一的精度。 用老古董COBE就行了。”
english: 'Well, since Professor Ye asked me to help you, let's do the observation. It's not a big deal. If you just need one percent precision, data from the antique COBE is sufficient.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Since it was mentioned by Ye Professor, I will observe. It's not that difficult, a tenth of a degree of precision. Use the old antique COBE."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If it was our teacher's observation, we could do it then. Besides, we don't need to waste time on it. We can make it with the old-colour COBE.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Since it's from Mr. Ye, we'll observe it, regardless of effort, with a precision of one percent. We can use the old COBE."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Since it was Professor Ye that suggested it, we can measure them. We have no need to strain ourselves. A percent accuracy is easy with old equipment like COBE.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Since it is what Professor Wang mentioned, I'll observe, no effort needed, just one part of the precision of 1%."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If it was our teacher's observation, we could observe as well. Anyway, we don't need that much precision. Just have COBE observe for us.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Since it's been assigned by Miss Leaf, let's observe, even if it doesn't take much effort; we'll settle for a tenth of the accuracy with the old-fashioned COBE."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Since it's Professor Ye's confession, we can measure them. Although it looks like a easy task, we still need to do it anyway because we'll have only percentagel accuracy. So use the old COBE detector.'

chinese: 夫妻二人半世只生此女，一旦失去，何等烦恼，因此昼夜啼哭，几乎不顾性命。 看看一月，士隐已先得病，夫人封氏也因思女构疾，日日请医问卦。
english: The shock of so sudden a loss to a middle-aged couple who had only ever had the one daughter can be imagined. In tears every day and most of the night, they almost lost the will to go on living, and after about a month like this first Shi-yin and then his wife fell ill, so that doctors and diviners were in daily attendance on them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The couple has two children in their half-life, but when they lose one, it is quite a burden, so they cry every day. Look at this month, Li Shunyi already had a serious illness of his own, and Lady Fang also was thinking about how she could cause him to die, asking for medical advice and consultation daily.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Having thus lost their only child, Wang Qiyao could scarcely have dreamed of returning to a fulfilling life, and the two years that had just passed had already bedeviled her. Every day she wailed on, night after night, for fear that by the time the next birth would come, her beloved son would suffer from illness or be framed for a lie. By the third month they were already on the point of losing him altogether, and Lady Shi's continuous supplication that he should recover continued unanswerable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The couple had only one daughter for half a lifetime. Once she is lost, what kind of trouble will it bring? Therefore, they were crying day and night. It seems that they don’t even care about their lives. After all, they have been waiting for a month already. Mr. Xing has already gotten sick. His wife Shen Fei also got ill because of thinking about her daughter. She was constantly asking doctors and astrologers.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The father and mother of Shi-yin had hitherto been lucky never to have been parented by any but one child; the arrival of this daughter had brought upon them a period of deepest sorrow which finally led to the man's illness and the woman's to feverish pursuit of cures from doctors and占卜师.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The couple had two children together for half a lifetime, but if they lose them, what kind of trouble would befall them? Therefore, they cried every night and even disregarded their lives. Look at the month, Shushan has already lost his health and Lu Shangina also because she thought that her daughter was ill. She kept asking doctors about it and did not stop until she died.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Having thus lost their little girl, Wang Qiyao could scarcely conceive of returning to life; hence each night she crieds, 'I must get well. ' She went about her activities with that earnestness normally reserved for a responsible woman, but when, after the medical examinations promised daily, the baby of her womb failed to improve, she abandoned all hope of recovery, sending every day to his mother a demand for a cure and a clear-up of any conspiracy by her to blame him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A couple had a daughter born when they were young. After their death, it was a great loss. They would often cry day and night for her. In one month, Mr. Xing had already fallen ill with a fever. His wife also fell sick because of thinking about her daughter. She kept visiting doctors and astrologers every day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In seeking a boy for their缺少女儿的过程中，丈夫死于意外，妻子悲痛之中患上了重病，而且每隔一日便去求医占卜，忧闷不已。一个月之后，已经有一个男孩的家境富裕的夫君就因为忧虑过度而得病身亡，他的妻子又因思念女儿而得病，也卧床不起，天天找医生看病，掷卦占气。

chinese: 皇帝和大官都很残忍，心里不喜欢谁，就说他犯了罪，把他放在鼎里活活煮熟。
english: Those ancient Emperors and great ministers were very cruel. If they didn't like somebody, they would pretend that they had committed some crime or other, and then they would put them in a cauldron and boil them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The emperor and officials were cruel and didn’t like anyone; they said he did something wrong and put him in a pot to cook it till it’s cooked through.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It seemed cruel to execute a poor man like this, so they said he was guilty and hung him in the cauldron to kill him slowly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Emperors and high officials are cruel, they say someone is guilty if they don't like him, and then boil him alive in a pot.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The cruel ones were the princes and emperors. If they disliked someone, they cooked him in a cauldron.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The emperor and high officials were cruel. They didn't like anyone, so they said he had done something wrong and put him in a pot to cook until it was finished.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was very cruel for the Emperor and the ordinary people on all sides to view him as guilty and to put him in the pot boiling over with salt.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The emperor and the big officials were cruel, saying that they had committed a crime if they did not like someone, and then putting them in the pot and boiling them alive.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The cruel rulers were the ones who liked it when things went wrong: they liked to hang or decapitate those who displease them.

chinese: 若迟了一步，回事的人多了，就难说了。
english: If we delay a moment longer, people will start coming in with messages and we shan't have a chance to speak to her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If they were late, there would be more people involved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If it were a too-long journey, there would likely be more difficulties if there was more confusion.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: If we're late, if more people get involved, it gets complicated.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: If I had waited a bit longer, there would have been more people around, and it would have been harder to explain.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: If you were late one step, there would be more people who could not say what they meant.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If it were a correct event, other than the迟到者太多的情况可能发生，所以它就不能确定。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If we're late, if more people get involved, it gets harder.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But if we had waited any longer than that, there would have been more people around, and it wouldn't have been so easy to explain.

chinese: 我的一边肩膀正好和陈清扬的腰等宽，记得那时她的脸红得厉害。
english: Her waist was exactly the width of my shoulder. I remember her face turning deep red then.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: My right shoulder is just as wide as hers, remembering how red her face was when she was so hot.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: My upper back刚好符合 Chen Qingyang's waist, and she blushed intensely then.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: My left shoulder was just as wide as Chen Qingyang’s waist then; I remember her face turning red then.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: My left shoulder was exactly the same width as Chen Qingyang's, and her face was red then as though she had just eaten something spicy.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: My right arm is exactly as wide as Hua Qingyang's waist; remember how red she was when her face turned hot.

chinese: 真正的现在的它是在废墟上建立起来的悲喜参半的忧乐园。
english: It was now a sorrowful paradise, a monument to both grief and joy, built upon ruins.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The real present is built on ruins, a melancholy mixture of joy and sorrow.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A true Happy-Turtle Park it may be, but constructed from abandoned buildings, it has a bit of sadness built in.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The true present is a half-sad, half-happy hell built on ruins.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: What really makes up this present imperfect world is the sorrowful paradise built on heaps of rubble.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The true Happy-Potential Future will be built from the ruins, and this combines sadness with a bit of joy.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It is a mixed joy-and-sorrow paradise built on ruins.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What actually is now is built on the ruins of bygone days—a mix of happiness and sorrow.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Where have you been?' said Bao-yu.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Go ahead, wait until the night comes again, hide in the west, I will be waiting for you."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Come on! Go and find them somewhere else! (I've got经验，以往他们来找过人，可都是在东边，到西边就麻烦了.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Go away. Come back at night. Wait quietly on the Western Hall."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But you must go off on your way now and when night comes, when the city enters into a new watch, come back here to my courtyard, and wait for me quietly. It's from there that I shall leave for Kiangsu.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Please translate the following Chinese text into English: "And you will go there; I will wait until night comes, then secretly and quietly, take me to the west door."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Come on! You've got to go! There'll be something happening in the evening. Why don't you try finding a way between West琉璃 and East Tango? I'll wait outside. It won't take very long because everything is made of wood.'

chinese: 王琦瑶到家后，她母亲已炖了鸡汤和红枣桂圆汤，什么话也没有地端给她喝，也不看那孩子一眼，就当没这个人似的。
english: When Wang Qiyao came home the next day, her mother had already prepared a pot of chicken broth and the customary bowl of soup with red jujube and longan, which was supposed to be so nourishing for new mothers. She handed the bowl to her daughter in silence. She did not bother to even look at her granddaughter; it was as if the child did not exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: After Wang Guirong arrived home, her mother had made a cup of chicken soup and a sweet and nutty red bean and plum dumpling soup for her. She did not speak to her at all; she was as if she did not exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: By the time Wang Qiyao had got here, her mother was already preparing a bowl of stock soup and a bowl of sweet-potato soup, both with lots of medicinal ingredients; she didn't even look at the baby and continued drinking without saying a word.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: After Wang Qiuyue returned home, her mother had already made chicken soup with dried ginger and dates, serving it to her without a word. She did not even look at the child as if she didn’t exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When she got home, Wang Qiyao was surprised to find her mother downstairs, preparing soup for her—either chicken soup or winteringvue, which had chopped up almonds and dried fruits in it. Without a word, she served them each a cup of soup and looked at them as if they were strangers.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: After Wang Guiren arrived home, her mother had prepared chicken soup and红枣桂圆汤，she didn’t say anything to her and did not look at that child. She was just like this.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): By the time Wang Qiyao had got here, her mother had already gone out a glass of stock soup (one of two she made, one of which she didn't even drink by herself—seclusion in contemplation as it turned out), and was no doubt looking down on this little creature; it seemed to her that he should not exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: After Wang Qiuyue came home, her mother had already prepared chicken soup and red dates and lotus roots for her. She served it without saying a word, never looking at the child.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Wang Qiyao got home, her mother had already stewed chicken soup and sweetened winter berries. Without saying a word, she just expected her to drink it without even looking at the baby. Like nobody else in the world, her mother seemed to think of her as if she did not exist.

chinese: 莺儿满心委屈，见姑娘说，不敢出声，只得放下钱来，口内嘟囔说：“一个做爷的，还赖我们这几个钱，连我也瞧不起!
english: Oriole smarted with the injustice of this, but her mistress had ordered it, so she had to pay up without arguing. She could not, however, forbear a few rebellious mutterings: 'Huh! One of the masters! Cheating a maid out of a few coppers! Even I should be ashamed!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The girl was upset with herself for not being able to say anything. She said, "I can't speak to you now, I'm afraid that will offend you too. Let me just say that I don't see myself as a doormat anymore."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Oriole was full of pity to see her refused to complain, but had to admit that she couldn't do anything about it. 'I'm no expert in disputing with a boy,' she said in a嘟哝的声音。 'He wouldn't want me to trouble him, even though he was being grumpy.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Ling er was full of resentment, saying that she could not speak because she could not say anything, so she put down her money, and muttered to herself: "A man is so lazy as to want to take a few dollars from us, let alone me!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Oriole was sad but she did as Aroma told her. She put her money down on the table without bothering to curse, forshe could not bring himself to use foul language in the presence of his little maid. 'A nasty bit of work you are!' he thought. 'To look down on a servant like you!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Cindy is heartbroken by what she has done. She says that she cannot speak out of her anger. Instead, she gives him a coin, which he takes out from his mouth and babbles: "An old man who does not want us to pay for our little acts of kindness will be very disappointed and angry with us. I do not care if you see me as a disgrace or not."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mothafit !! Trinket was embarrassed to say anything. All he had to say was 'I'm not able to speak up' —and then he began to get mused. 'A good-natured cousin of ours! Not to lie on his doorstep like usual! And I thought you all ought to know!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ling'er was very unhappy as she saw the young lady, unable to speak out, so she gave the money back, saying, "A man who takes our few coins, he looks down upon us too!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Oriole, for her part, was incensed. She could not forbear the侮辱, and throwing her money down on the table, she exclaimed indignantly: 'A master like you should treat us that way! You make me see why they're calling me a liar!

chinese: 但来自附中的四位小将自有她们“无坚不摧”的革命方式，刚才动手的那个女孩儿又狠抽了叶哲泰一皮带，另外三个女孩子也都分别抡起皮带抽了一下，当同伴革命时，她们必须表现得更革命，至少要同样革命。
english: But the four junior high girls had their own revolutionary methods that they believed were invincible. The girl who had hit Ye before took out her belt and whipped Ye again. The other three girls also took off their belts to strike at Ye. With their companion displaying such revolutionary fervor, they had to display even more, or at least the same amount.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: But the four middle school girls who had come from their underground camp also showed a revolutionary way of fighting, which was kicked by the girl who hit me last time. The three other girls all picked up the belt and beat me on one side with each other, and when they were on the front line, they must display more revolutionary spirit than what they were before.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But the four juniorigers were different from the original three. The one that had punched Ye just before gave her a pelt of skin; the other three gave turns as quickly as they came. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: But four girls from Hanyu High School have their own revolutionary ways. The girl who just slapped Ye Zhe Tai with a belt just now is also very ruthless. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But the four young ladies of the Affiliated High School had a revolutionary method of dealing with their enemies—the revolutionery method of backside slapping. The one who gave Ye his spanking was yet another victim. Other than that, the other three girls divided the belt among themselves and slapped him as well. Since they needed to show how revolutionary they were, it followed that they too must be revolutionary.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But the four junior members of the college were themselves revolutionary in their own ways. The girl who had grabbed onto the belt that was thrown at her by the other three girls also poked her with a fist. At this point, it is clear that she must act like a revolutionary, whether it be for herself or for others.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But of the four guard sons, four of them (including the one who had beaten Ye just moments ago) were different from the other three; the other two girls each gave a swift kick, and the other three gave moderate kicks as they went through Ye's body. At this time, a girl like Ye was required to demonstrate revolutionary: she must give it their whole makayaa!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But the four girls from Attached High School had their own revolutionary ways. The girl who just struck was so vicious that she slapped Ye Zhe Tai again. Three other girls also swung their belts and hit him. When they were fighting together, they must show even more revolution than their comrades.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But the four girls from Affiliated Middle School had a revolutionary method of dealing with their opponents, so the girl who had given Ye the lashes was not the only one who struck back. The other three girls also raised their belts and slapped him, as well as slapping the other three classmates. When it came time to revolutionize themselves, the other girls had to be just as revolutionary.

chinese: 忽听窗下弄堂里嘈杂声起，便推窗望去，原来是谁家在鸡窝里抓住一只黄鼠狼。
english: All of a sudden, rowdy noises broke out from the longtang outside. Opening the window to look out, Mr. Cheng saw that a crowd had gathered around a man holding up a weasel he had caught in his chicken coop.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Just at that moment a commotion arose from the window underneath him; he opened it slightly with his hand and looked through it; it occurred to him that they must be chasing after a wild piggy, which must have been the brown wolf that had appeared in the nest before.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Once outside the forest, Ye felt a sense of renewal. 'It really was spring again,' she thought. The snowed-over springs of previous years had certainly ended, but everything was recovering.

chinese: 他说我以前的说话中有扬州腔调，恐怕…… 恐怕…… 那么他眼睛给我弄瞎这回事，他知不知道？”
english: 'I thought he said just now that I used to have a Yangzhou accent. Perhaps . . . perhaps he does know that I blinded him.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He said that I had a Jiangxi accent before, may be… I mean, he knows about it? Maybe he does not know about it?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He said that the words I used had a Hangzhou flavor to them, probably . . . which way . . . which way might . . . be that I made my sightblind.'

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He said he heard something similar in my way of speaking back when we were young, and I'm afraid . . . I'm afraid he wouldn't understand.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He said that there was something wrong with my speech in the past, may be… I am afraid… And what about this matter? Does he know that?”

chinese: 轿子起行，忽悠悠似腾云驾雾，偷懒的吹鼓手在出村不远处就停止了吹奏，轿夫们的脚下也快起来。
english: Off they went, floating along as though riding the clouds or sailing through a mist. Shortly after leaving the village, the lazy musicians stopped playing, while the bearers quickened their pace.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The carriage started moving, like a cloud passing over the mountains, and was lazily playing with the bell while he stopped playing at the village outside. The footmen's feet were rising fast as well.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As the sedan chair rose up, it seemed to be the clouds or a ghost cloud that lifted away, sending all but the most reluctant bearers into a panic; yet they were soon back in motion again, sensing the conductor's pace coming on.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The carriage started moving; it was like riding on a cloud or flying on a broomstick. The slack trumpeters stopped blowing their horns as soon as they left the village, and the horse-drawn carriages started running faster.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Suddenly they rose up, swaying like ravening winds as those charging drums and blaring horns were silenced for good measure a good way down the road from the village entrance, and the bearers began to scurry forward more tenaciously.

chinese: 雨水把奶奶的衣服也打湿了，她本来可以挂上轿帘遮挡雨水，她没有挂，她不想挂，奶奶通过敞亮的轿门，看到了纷乱不安的宏大世界。
english: Her clothes, too, were soaked. She could have covered herself with the curtain, but she didn't; she didn't want to, for the open front of the sedan chair afforded her a glimpse of the outside world in all its turbulence and beauty.

chinese: 多么丑恶的东西，我上半生一直在用文学这把解剖刀来揭露这种丑恶，现在连这种揭露都厌倦了。
english: 'The human race is hideous. I've spent the first half of my life unveiling this ugliness with the scalpel of literature, but now I'm even sick of the work of dissection.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: What a disgusting thing I have been using this half of my life for to expose it - now I am getting tired of that too.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What disgusting thing did I just expose myself to? I've been using my literary knife to examine human hearts since I was born—nothing let me so much as a pebble—or now I'm sick of doing it.

chinese: 虽然我奶奶与他已经在高粱地里凤凰和谐，在那个半是痛苦半是幸福的庄严过程中，我奶奶虽然也怀上了我的功罪参半但毕竟是高密东北乡一代风流的父亲，但那时奶奶是单家的明媒正娶的媳妇，爷爷与她总归是桑间濮上之合，带着相当程度的随意性偶然性不稳定性，况且我父亲也没落土，所以，写到那时候的事，我还是称呼他余占鳌更为准确。
english: Even though by then he and Grandma had already done the phoenix dance in the sorghum field, and even though, in the solemn course of suffering and joy, she had conceived my father, whose life was a mixture of achievements and sin (in the final analysis, he gained distinction among his generation of citizens of Northeast Gaomi Township), she had nonetheless been legally married into the Shan family. So she and Granddad were adulterers, their relationship marked by measures of spontaneity, chance, and uncertainty. And since Father wasn't born while they were together, accuracy demands that I refer to Granddad as Yu Zhan'ao in writing about this period.

However， it was indeed a father who lived in the region of high mountain East China， whose name is one of the most beautiful families in the area. But she was married to his mother by marriage as a single man in her own family， so they were both from the same spring and autumn， and they had quite a degree of randomness and instability. Besides， I don't have any roots at all， so I call him "Rema" more accurately when writing about what happened then.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Even though she was a凤凰在地的高级庄户新娘， she already had the weight of my crime balance—though she was also the son's marriage wife who bore his child, Gou Zhen Guo, and since her father hadn't come from a rich noble family, it was still more the result of缘分和天命。 So when writing about their relationships, Yu Zhan'ao was still referred to more correctly as Zong Qun's bridegroom. He hadn't even been born yet.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: While my grandmother was with him in the cornfield, they were getting along harmoniously. In that solemn process of love and pain, although my grandmother was also carrying half of my sins and half of my virtues, she was still a clear-cut wife from the Nantong region. But then, my grandmother was a single woman who got married by the side of her family, and her husband had been randomly married without any rules. Besides, my father wasn't even down on his knees, so I still call him Yu Quaoleo when writing about those things.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Even though Grandma and he had flown into the凰的痛苦和幸福的庄严殿堂, she became a half-sick half-happy childbearing gourd field, but since Grandma was the daughter of a wealthy family from Northeast Gaomi, she retained the nature of a permanent windbreaker father, and爷爷与她总是如胶似漆的感情上的随意和不稳定的婚姻,偶然结合在一起。因此,到了后来,当我写关于他们事情的时候,还是以独子的身份称他为 Yu Zhan'ao is more accurate.

Moreover, I did not descend from the earth, so I called him "Mr. Lu".

Father, who had never set foot on land, didn't even live on our mother's land, making it hard to find the right fit between their personalities. So the things that really interested me most about this chapter were things like how Old Colour bought a bride from a sorghum field, while he'd also murdered his wife and the daughter of his cousin Jia Huan—and we hadn't even mentioned the fact that he'd been convicted of both Murder of the Brother and Marriage to a Little Maid and Murder by诱骗。

So when I wrote about what happened then, I still preferred to call him Xiao Gao.

But by the time this section of the novel took place, she was no longer Shan Guo Northeast Editor, and Old Geng had left the area. So, calling him Yu Zhan'ao instead of Old Geng was more accurate.

chinese: 他甚是得意，说道：“嗯，右脸刻一堆牛粪，可没人出钱来买牛粪的，不如刻只猪，又肥又蠢，生意一定好。”

chinese: 吾今始悟作画意， 痛哭流涕有若是。
english: Now that I seem to read the painter's mind, My bitter teardrops match his drizzling rain.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Now I understand the true purpose of the painting: I cried with joy.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now I understand completely the purpose of painting. I too can weep as truly as you!

chinese: “哈，我觉得那是最不真实的！” IT副总裁说，“我用公司的上百名员工进行过一个简单的测试，即使这想法真能实现，人列计算机的运算速度可能比一个人的手工计算都慢。”
english: 'Ha! I thought that was the most unrealistic aspect,' the software company vice president said. 'I conducted a test with more than a hundred employees at my company. Even if the idea worked, a computer made of people would probably operate at a speed slower than manual computation.'

chinese: 道路两边，板块般的高粱坚固凝滞，连成一体，拥拥挤挤，彼此打量，灰绿色的高粱穗子睡眼未开，这一穗与那一穗根本无法区别，高粱永无尽头，仿佛潺潺流动的河流。
english: Barriers of sorghum stalks lining the path stood erect and solid in unbroken rows, tightly packed, together sizing one another up with the yet unopened clay-green eyes of grain ears, one indistinguishable from the next, as far as she could see, like a vast river.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Along each side of the road, a series of thick, blocky stalks of wheat stand stiffly, unbroken by the wind. They were all crowded together and looked at each other from across the street, gray-green wheat stalks sleeping peacefully. There was no difference between them; the grain on one stalk would never be recognized as that of the other. This grain was endless, flowing like a river.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sorghum on either side of the road was firmly joined together, like a rows of terraces where each side was bound by an impenetrable wall. One could not tell the difference between two crops, because every bush was锁定得紧紧，如同蜿蜒的河溪，没有尽头。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: On either side of the road, the sturdy high grain blocks up close together like a wall, all crowded together, looking at each other, greenish-gray grains of corn sleeping without opening their eyes, one with another grain cannot be distinguished from the other, corn never ends, as if it were a flowing river.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The roads were covered with red square tiles, solid and rigid, packed so tightly together that they didn't even look like one another from this vantage point. The green stalks, still closed-eyed, seemed incapable of distinguishing themselves from the others; the tiling stretched out forever in front of them, flowing like a flowing river.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The fields on both sides of the road form a complex network, forming a continuous structure. Each grain is held together by pressure, so that they cannot distinguish each other. The green wheat stalks sleep in bed with each other, unable to recognize each other. There is no end to this cycle of growth; the river flows slowly. This seems like a flowing stream of grains.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sorghum on either side of the road was firmly binded together, impenetrable; shaved-face shaped like each stalk, the tightly packed stalks could not tell one from another, sleeping faces of the sorghum; the river of sorghum flowed endlessly unapproachable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: On either side of the road, rows of corn were piled up like massive blocks. They were all closely packed together, each one looking at the other, their green leaves sleeping, as if they could not distinguish one from another. The corn was endless, as if it flowed endlessly.

chinese: 它压倒了薄荷的幽香，压倒了高粱的甘苦，它唤醒了父亲那越来越迫近的记忆，一线穿珠般地把墨水河淤泥、把高粱下黑土、把永远死不了的过去和永远留不住的现在联系在一起，有时候，万物都会吐出人血的味道。
english: It overwhelmed the smell of peppermint and the pungent sweetness of sorghum and awakened in Father's mind a memory that drew ever nearer: like beads, it strung together the mud of the Black Water River, the black earth beneath the sorghum, the eternally living past, and the unstoppable present. There are times when everything on earth spits out the stench of human blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It overwhelmed the sweet perfume of chives, the bitter taste of high粱, it awakened a father's increasingly close recollection, one line by line, connecting the muddy waters of ink on the riverbed, the black soil of the lowland, and the memories that have yet to die, and even those that have already passed away. Sometimes, every thing would release the scent of blood from human souls.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It overwhelmed the sweet aroma of peppermint, overwhelmed the odour of sorghum,唤醒了父亲日益靠近的灵魂，一线一线地连上父亲逝去的时间，时间啊，是将什么都吐出来，时间啊，是永不停息现在。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: It smothered the delicate fragrance of mint, the bitter taste of corn, it awakened my father's memories that were approaching him like a thread through the ink river, connecting the black soil under the high粱 with the unkillable past and the uncatchable present at times, sometimes even exuding a smell of human blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: It subdues the sweet fragrance of peppermint grass, overwhelmed by the stronger aroma of sorghum: It calls up memories Father had grown near to forgetting, which thread after thread conjure up a river peopled with souls, where fermented swamp soil is stringed like pearls, and where the future lies buried until it can no longer be dug up. Sometimes the world awakens Father's memories, releasing its blood as it exhales.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It crushed the faint fragrance of mint and the sweetness of high粱， it awakened the father's more distant memories， a line connecting the ink-stained river sedimented soil， blackened soil that was never dead and forever lost， connected with all the past and the present． Sometimes， everything would release the smell of human blood．
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sweet odour of peppermint overcomes the fainting清香; the pleasant aroma of sorghum smothers Father's growing distance from home; as it does something thing by linking the sticky black mud beneath the clay of the Black Water River with the bitter lips of eternity; even there, the object of time seems to release the odour of blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It overpowers the delicate mint scent, the sweet corn taste, it awakens my father's memory that is growing ever closer, a thread through which ink river muck, black soil of the highland, and the past that will never die are all connected, sometimes, everything even spits out the smell of human blood.

At times, everything seemed to exhale the smell of human blood.

chinese: 这件事有两种可能的原因，一是他下来视察，遇见了我对他装聋作哑，因而大怒，不走了。 二是他不是下来视察，而是听说陈清扬和我有了一腿，特地来找我的麻烦。
english: His visit could be accounted for in two ways: one was that he came down to our team for the investigation, but when he met someone like me who played dumb with him, he got pissed off and decided to stay; the other was that he came down to our team not for investigation, but to pick on me, after hearing that Chen Qingyang and I had a love affair.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Two possible reasons for this event are two: one is that he came down to see me and express his disapproval of my silence; another is that he did not come down to see me, but rather heard about our affair with Chen Qingyan and went out to trouble me.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: There are two possible explanations for this matter: one is that he came down and encountered me with a deafening silence, causing him great anger, and then did not go on. The other is that he did not come down but heard about my affair with Chen Qingyun and went after me because he was surprised at the news that we had a relationship.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There may be two possible causes for this incident: one is that he came down to inspect and saw me talking nonsense so as to provoke a fight with me; and the other is that he heard that Chen Qingyang had hooked up with me and was looking for trouble specifically because of it.

chinese: 惯养娇生笑你痴，菱花空对雪澌澌。
english: 'Fond man, your pampered child to cherish so— That caltrop-glass which shines on melting snow!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit:
The translation is as follows: 

"Obey your father, and you will be a fool; he stands alone beside snowflakes."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Always wanting to be your lover's little darling, Always jealous of you for being more than you ought, When all you see is snow and ice in the field, You must envy my love for you.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Growing up spoiled, you fool me, sweetly; my eyes are looking at the snow."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Youthful indulgence makes fools of us all; Standing before the frozen mirror, Say: How foolishly I've grown!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Tired of your carefree antics, I am amused by the empty-faced beauty of the snowflakes.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Arest your watch set too far right or left? For a girl like this, a pair of eyes is a treasure,
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Coddled and spoiled, you're a fool, laughing at me while I stand by alone in my snowstorm.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Elderly printings were too kind To you her folly dared declare; Crystal vase stood empty on its steeple Snow melted in the sun-kissed vale.

chinese: 他们杀人越货，精忠报国，他们演出过一幕幕英勇悲壮的舞剧，使我们这些活着的不肖子孙相形见绌，在进步的同时，我真切地感到种的退化。
english: They killed, they looted, and they defended their country in a valiant, stirring ballet that makes us unfilial descendants who now occupy the land pale by comparison. Surrounded by progress, I feel a nagging sense of our species' regression.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: They kill people for their own greed and glorify themselves by performing heroic dramas that make us look like we have no place in the world of progress. I truly feel that they have degenerated.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: They commit murders for their own good, and put their lives on the line in every movie they produce. They performed a kind of heroic ballet for us those poor actors who grew up to face our时代的挑战, and weakened us at the same time. The feeling I feel is that we were being decaying.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: They kill and rob, loyal to their country, they have put on a dance of bravery and tragedy that makes us, living descendants, seem pitifully inadequate, while at the same time I feel the profound degradation as progress is made.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: They slaughtered heroes and traitors yet themselves, then wrote plays in which individual honor could be restored despite their own crumbling individualities; I, a living product of the age they created, felt myself gradually degraded both as a man and a citizen.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: They kill people for money, and fight for righteousness. They have performed dramas which were heroic and tragic in their own way, making us feel like we are inferior when we compare ourselves to them, and I am deeply sorry that our culture is degenerating.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They kill with zeal and fidelity; their productions are performed by them when evil deeds are committed. They performed a scene or two each time a new life is born, and left our mediocre human beings on the edge of their seats, feeling that we were being degraded.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: They commit murder and robbery, and they perform a heroic drama of bravery and tragedy. In this way, we, their living descendants, have become inferior to them. At the same time, I feel that my own backwardness has been brought to light by this process.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They killed for their nation and robbed and pillaged with a passion; they put on plays, scenes of valour, heroism, all the while making us feel like spoiled children. While staying progressive, I felt myself gradually regress.

chinese: 韦小宝应了，走进房中，只见桌上放着碗筷，四菜一汤，没人动过，忙道：“公公，你不吃饭？
english: 'Yes, Goong-goong!' Trinket walked across to the dining-table, where bowls and chopsticks had been laid, four dishes and a soup, all untouched. 'Goong-goong, aren't you eating?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Zhu Zai Bo should have eaten, he entered the room and saw on the table were chopsticks and soup dishes, nobody had moved since, saying, "Sir, you don't eat?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Yes,' replied Trinket obediently and followed him into the room. As he did, though, the table was already set with dinner on it, and the four kinds of food that had been served up before had hardly been moved since his absence. 'How can you be eating all day long if you aren't eating anything?' he said to his old grannie.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Xiaopai answered and entered the room. He saw that there was a bowl of bowls on the table. There were four dishes and soup. He didn’t move them at all. He asked, "Master, you don’t want to eat?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket took his answer as an invitation to go to bed. Inside, however, he found the bowls set out on the table, untouched. 'Goong-goong,' he said (for '公公' had now become an open invitation to go to bed), 'you don't seem to have eaten yet. . . .'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Shangbo answered by nodding his head and entering the room. He saw on the table were cups and plates, four dishes one soup. Everyone was silent, and said with a smile: "Sir, you don't eat?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Oh yes!' cried Trinket as he rushed off to follow him. 'You haven't worked yet today!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoya nodded and walked into the room. There was a bowl of chopsticks on the table. Four dishes and soup were there. She asked, "Grandfather, don't you want to eat?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket found a bowl on the table and some chopsticks, but there was no one to have lunch, so he assumed that he was not to eat either.

chinese: 半日鸦雀不闻。 忽见两个人抬了一张炕桌来，放在这边炕上，桌上碗盘摆列，仍是满满的鱼肉，不过略动了几样。
english: A long silence ensued in which not so much as a cheep could be heard; then two women came in bearing a small, low table which they set down on the kang. It was covered with bowls and dishes containing all kinds of meat and fish, only one or two of which appeared to have been touched.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Half a day I do not hear of them. Suddenly, two people came over with a table on one side of the bed. The table was covered with fish and meat still, but they did not move any of it at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After a good deal of meditation he was completely deaf to anything that might have may have been, but just then, as he lay there idly, visions of fishing in the river and hunting in the mountains flashed through his mind and caused him to hear the sound of rustling leaves; there was one end of a kang-table propped up with another table, loaded with fish and meat already cooked: still满满的一桌子饭菜，只是把几样稍加改动的改变了些。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Quiet as a half-day. Suddenly two men carried a bed table and set it here on this bed. The bowls and dishes on the table were still full of fish and meat, but just slightly moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But all that time there was not a bird or insect in the field; then two men came, carried an table on their backs, and set this up in the kang opposite from Wang Qiyao, with fish and meat laid out before it as before, but only very slightly modified.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Half a day they did not hear any noise. Suddenly there was one person coming over with a table on the side of the bed, placed on that table, still filled with fish and meat, but he moved a few things here and there.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a certain number of days the twins had stopped talking to each other and now, after some uncertainty, began listening. There was someone coming in and getting up one of the kangcun sofas, with the chair already laid out for him on the table. On the desk were a set of dining-rubbing-stones standing in front of him with all the fish and meat that came届目便在他面前摆出一桌子丰餐的物事，在其中稍有变动者，单最易动之物。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There was no sound at all for half a day. Suddenly two people brought in a炕 table, placed it here, and the bowls and dishes were still full of fish meat, but they moved few things around.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But then for a time no birds or insects rang, until two men came, whom Wang Qiyao guessed had been hired for the evening; they set the table down at the side of the kang, and, like their predecessors, there was ample fish and meat, but only very slightly altered.

chinese: 谁知狗儿利名心重，听如此说，心下便有些活动； 又听他妻子这番话，便笑道：“老老既这么说，况且当日你又见过这姑太太一次，为什么不你老人家明日就去走一遭，先试试风头儿去？”
english: Gou-er's cupidity, however, had been aroused by the words of his mother-in-law, and his reaction to them was less discouraging than his wife's. 'Well, if it's as you say, Grannie, and being as you've already seen this lady, why not go there yourself and spy out the land for us?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: What's the matter with that dog who loves his name so much? He heard what your wife said and thought, "Why would you want to go out again this time? Why not come out once a day before you start showing off!"

Then he heard her make quite another statement, and he could hardly restrain himself from laughing: 'If you will, old man,' he said, 'if you have seen this Miss Wang once before, and if she has mentioned you by name today, I think it might not hurt, old man, to take a walk around with you to see how the wind is blowing.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: What dog is so attached to his name that he will think of it when hearing this? And then he would smile at her as she spoke. "I don't know why you say that; I heard that from your wife yesterday, yet why did you not tell me about it yourself?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was not surprising that Tchau-er's heart were still in business even when he was informed of this visit; but before he could make any further progress, his wife intervened. 'It is exactly what they say,' her husband said, 'when you have seen your mistress. Why, if you haven't, why not try it today? You've got a good start, old fellow.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Who knew that Dog儿心地深沉，听了这话心中也有些动弹。 Then hearing her wife say this, he laughed, saying: "If your husband says so, and you've seen Miss Chou once before, why haven't you gone for a walk with him tomorrow? Why not go and take a look around?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Gou-er, for instance. Though this set of circumstances might have delighted a more gaiety-mongering sort, hearing his wife's somewhat scolding version of her expectations, he detected a flicker of activity in the periphery of his mind; then, hearing her go on in a more relaxed, if slightly raillery-laden, manner, that old foghorn nearly howled with delight: 'If so, Mrs Cheng, I for one would be happy to take a look round first, just to take the wind out of her sails!'

chinese: 贾蔷翻身出来，纸笔现成，拿来叫贾瑞写。 他两个做好做歹，只写了五十两银子，画了押，贾蔷收起来。 然后撕掳贾蓉。
english: Jia Qiang at once disappeared and reappeared only a moment later with paper and a writing-brush which had evidently been made ready in advance. Writing at his dictation Jia Rui was compelled, in spite of protests, to put down fifty taels of silver as the amount on the IOU. The document, having been duly signed, was at once pocketed by Jia Qiang, who then pretended to seek the connivance of Jia Rong.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He jumped up when Jia Qiang suddenly appeared, and then continued to draw his brush as though he were yet to begin. At last he produced a set of parchment and proceeded to begin writing. Not long after, he took off most of the payment from it, wrapped it up in a paper, and hid them away. Then he tore Nannie's clothes.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Jia Rui got up and wrote on a piece of paper. He made his way back to the house and went upstairs to find his brother. After a while, he came out with a piece of paper and some ink in his hand. He asked Jia Rong for money. The two brothers had a long talk about their plans. They finally decided to go to the capital together and open a shop there. In the evening, they met at the street corner.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When Jia Qiang threw himself from under the sheet, Guo Lu and Jia Rui had immediate cause for celebration. 'Any old paper you've got, go!' they said to Jia Muer and Jia Rong, who were haggling over the price of their inheritance. In no time at all they produced a cheque for fifty taels of silver and drew it up in Jia Rong's name; then they ripped up the paper as soon as he was away.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Jie Cere was lying on the ground, holding a paper and pen in his hands. He brought it over to call upon Qian Rui. He two of them had done well and wrote fifty shillings, drawing a bond. Jie Cere took it away. Then he tore up Qian Ling.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He jumped up and took the paper and pen offered him, and with a few hurried calculations wrote out a letter requesting their help to find their money. 'I've made fifty taels out of it,' he said, and sent it along with the papers; but before he could take his daughter out, Jia Rui's imagination went wild. He drew a picture on it with his hand, saying 'Here is the amount', and then turned it over to his son, who hid it under his bed.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Zhajia reversed his body, paper and pen were already prepared, he called Jiarui to write. They did it well but wrote fifty silver pieces, drew a signature, Zhajia took them back. Then he tore up Jiarong.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Jia Qiang threw Jia Rui out of the room and, at the instant a sheet of paper was laid on his shoulder, drew a diagram showing how the fifty taels should be divided up, put his signature on it, and left with Jia Rong to be torn to pieces.

chinese: 八月深秋，无边无际的高粱红成洸洋的血海，高粱高密辉煌，高粱凄婉可人，高粱爱情激荡。
english: In late autumn, during the eighth lunar month, vast stretches of red sorghum shimmered like a sea of blood. Tall and dense, it reeked of glory; cold and graceful, it promised enchantment; passionate and loving, it was tumultuous.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In early autumn, a river of red wheat flows through the vastness of the land, where high wheat fields stretch out before you, bright and brilliant, and tender and lovely. The harvest is sweet with the aroma of its own sweetness, and the love for it is stirring.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sorghum, red as blood by now of eighty- ninth hour, had risen up red as well above high ground, its mournful beauty and passionate allure surpassing any human desire.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In August autumn, endless tall sunflowers turn red like blood seas. The tall sunflowers are so magnificent and beautiful that they attract people. The love of tall sunflowers is exciting.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Autumn8 is approaching, and the undulating red fields seem to hold in their embrace an infinite supply of passionate love.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In early September, high粱如同海洋一般赤裸着，高粱高大繁盛，高粱哀伤动人，高粱爱情激荡。
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sorghum, red as hell, was on fire in the eighth month of the autumn, driving away any doubts about its feelings.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: In August, autumn deep, the corn is red like a blood sea, the corn is high and brilliant, the corn is sad but charming, and the corn is passionate love.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Autumn in August brought fireblood covering an immeasurable area of sorghum, so dense it reflected the brilliance of the sun; the sorghum grieved tenderly for its lover, although from a distance; and as for all time, the love stories of the sorghum seeds had begun.

chinese: 那鱼、猪不过贵而难得，这藕和瓜亏他怎么种出来的!
english: Maybe not so much the sturgeon and the sucking-pig. They're just expensive. But where would you go to get a piece of lotus root or a melon like that? However did they get them to grow so big?

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The fish, pig, and chicken are all expensive but hard to get. The yams and cucumbers cost too much for him to grow!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: A fish and an pig were worth more than the mountain and river in these parts; nevertheless he counted how many pearls and cucumbers he could grow out of one acre of land!

chinese: 这些人嘴里尊称自己是香主，满口什么静候香主吩咐云云，其实各人肚里早就有了主意，只盼得到自己赞同，于是一切便推在韦香主头上，日后他们就不会担当重大干系。
english: It was all 'Master this' and 'Master that' and respectfully waiting to be told by the Master what they should do; but invariably they had already decided what they wanted to do and only wanted the Master's approval for doing it, so that if there was any question about it later, the Master would have sole responsibility for what they had done.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: These people speak of themselves as the "host" of the holy fragrance, but their mouths are saying "I await your commands." In fact, all along inside them is a plan that they have been waiting for. Only when they get the approval from the Holy Fragrance do they put on the hat of the Holy Fragrance. Then it will be hard for them to take responsibility for major matters in the future.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: These men would their titles with laurels because of their association with the Master of Fa: 'Let me be your guide in the meditation of your ways,' they would tell each other; but deep down they were all too aware that, much earlier, they had already arrived at a decision and that it was only a question of accepting or rejecting the Master's instructions. At that point in their internal debates all concerned were master Orang-who'd-chiezed or his chosen Companion—or even more likely one of them—whomever he might be. They had all reached a consensus so quickly that they had simply pushed this declaration off to the後半夜, i.e., tomorrow, by which time it would be time for Orang-who-chiezed or his master's instructions to be carried out.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: These people who call themselves Master of the Incense Smell all say they will wait for Master of the Incense Smell's orders, but actually each one has his own plan in mind. They just hope that their plans will be approved by Master of the Incense Smell so that they can avoid getting involved in any serious issues later on.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: By calling you Master General they were obliging you with polite courtesies—the actual master of the temple, it being understood, was always waiting for his instructions; but the real decision-bearer was Vice-Manager Wen. Any time he felt like doing something, all the responsibility lay with him—so he passed it on to his junior and incurred no risk himself.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: These people speak of themselves as a "Sincere Master". They talk about receiving orders from the "Sincere Master" without any consideration for what they will be given by the "Sincere Master", and all this is put on their shoulders. However, each person has already decided on something that he or she believes in. The "Sincere Master" does not have time to take care of everything; therefore, it is no longer important for them to take responsibility for anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It is the ringleader's wish that everyone present should do his work, so he presents himself as such—and in fact assumes with百分之百的信心的忠诚，对于任何他人的建议都不肯另他一票。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: These people spoke with respect of themselves as "saints" , they said they were waiting for the saint's orders, in fact each of them already had his own plan, he just wanted to get it approved by the saint so that everything would be put on the saint's shoulders. Afterward, they wouldn't have any responsibility.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): 称呼自己为香主，嘴里说着等待主人的命令这样的话时，每个人心里都早有主意。只是不知道韦香主要不要，于是将责任推向韦香主，让他们日后无所作为。

chinese: 彼此的梦里都做过无数回，那梦里的人都不大像了，还不如不梦见。
english: They had appeared in each other's dreams, but the images in their dreams were so far from the real person that they would have been better off not even dreaming.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Both of us have done countless dreams about each other; those dreams were not very similar, so I don't want to dream at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Both of them had made countless images of themselves dreaming and waking up with distinct identities, but hers were no longer identity-free; it was more like the dead had awoken.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: They had dreamed about each other countless times, but now they were not like the people in their dreams. It was better not to dream.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: They had thousands of such dreams, in which the participants were no longer recognizable. Unfortunately, this did not happen during real sleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Both of us have done countless dreams with them, and the people who dream don't resemble each other at all; I would rather not have a dream than not having one.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Both of them had made countless scenes in her mind in which she acted as if she were someone other than herself; those scenes rarely ever failed to resemble anyone else, but still it felt like they hadn't grown any younger.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: They all have done many dreams together, but their dreams don't look like each other at all. It's better not to dream about it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They had done it a dozen times over, which was why they were getting worse; neither Wang Qiyao nor Kang Mingxun could be distinguished from one another in the dreams, which ended up being closer to a nightmare than a dream.
