chinese: 国家兴亡，匹夫有责，暂时避祸则可，但若去躲在桃花源里，逍遥自在，忍令亿万百姓在鞑子铁蹄下受苦，于心何安？
english: The citizen of a conquered country still has his duty. It's all very well to take temporary refuge, but to live a life of ease in some Peach Tree Haven while millions are suffering under the iron heel of the Tartars would be less than human.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The fate of a nation lies in one's own hands. For a while, if we hide behind a castle or stay away from the war, our spirits can be at peace. But when we're forced to suffer under the iron fist of the enemy, how can we feel that we are safe?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When the whole of China is in the hands of the invaders,' he thought, 'I shall have to flee into the spring green Vale of Light and be content to let millions of our people suffer under the iron hand of the Tartar. I should not be able to bear that'.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Responsibility for the country's prosperity belongs to all citizens. It is fine to temporarily escape from trouble, but if you hide away in a utopia of flowers and butterflies, not suffering at the hands of the Qing army, how can your conscience rest?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The nation has a responsibility to its leaders. If they can hide from their troubles in a place like a romantic idyllic paradise, all the better; but if we allow millions of ordinary citizens to kneel at the Iron Footprints of the Tartars in peace, we shall have no peace ourselves.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The state of one's country is inextricably linked to one's own responsibility, and if we choose to avoid the troubles of the present moment, it could be okay, but if we stay behind the castle of a peaceful life, we will suffer for eternity, what can we be content with?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If we're not able to do anything about it, at least we can do our part by hiding and waiting for an opportune moment to leave. Then we can wander off into the桃花源, let ourselves be lulified and pampered until all those hundred million suffer like their own pets under the iron hand of their masters.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Responsibility lies with all men when a country is at peril. It is not right to hide away in a utopia while suffering the lives of millions.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The end of the world does not worry me,' said the man, 'but it does concern a man of conviction to see his countrymen tortured and murdered by Tartar iron feet.

chinese: 高粱棵子里似乎有痛苦的呻吟声，尸体堆中好像有活物的蠕动，父亲想唤住爷爷，去看看这些尚未死利索的乡亲。 他仰起脸来，看到爷爷那副绿锈斑斑、丧失了人的表情的青铜面孔，把话儿压进了喉咙。
english: Tortured moans emerged from the field of sorghum, and here and there among the bodies some movement appeared. Father was burning to ask Granddad to save those fellow villagers who were still alive, but when he saw the pale, expressionless look on his father's bronze face, the words stuck in his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: There is a pungent sound of sorrow in the high粱树上， as if there were living beings moving around in the corpses on the grave. Father wanted to call his grandfather to see those who had died too late but could not bring himself to do so. He raised his face up and saw that the old man's copper-faced bronze appearance was still lost its person. He said, "Grandfather, I want to call you."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sorghum stalks seemed to humiliate one another; human-like noises were heard within the sorghum, and Father wished he could drag Granddad off to see the tortured comrades who still appeared as though dead, but seeing the hilt of that broken, shattered bronze helmet pressed against his face, he just let the pain seep away.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The stalks of sorghum seemed to be crying out with pain; the corpses looked as if they were moving. The father wanted to stop his grandfather from looking at these unburied neighbors who had not yet died. He lifted his face and saw that the grandfather's face was covered by green rust spots and had lost its human expression, so he kept the words in his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: High-ranking officials moaned in the sorghum fields, corpses shifted among themselves; Father wanted to call out to Granddad, to stretch out his hand and save the desperate man from himself. He opened his mouth, but Granddad's face, grained brown byshot, lost any human expression, held firm in the earth.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In the high粱树里， there seems to be a mournful voice of suffering; in the corpses that lay on the ground, there is life moving slowly. He raised his head and saw the face of the old grandfather, with a damaged copper face, which seemed to be moving slowly. He tried to call out to his grandfather, but he could not speak as he heard the sound of a man’s voice from the grave.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sorghum fields seemed to moan of their own accord, as corpses strewn across the field moved motionless among the stalks. Father wanted to reach out to Granddad, but, with his green, rusty face tarnished and his bronze face too brittle for movement, it became clear to him that he could not语气激昂地去看爷爷的惨死。 He raised his head, saw the丧失人性的青铜面膛，将的话压进了喉咙。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There seemed to be a wail of pain in the grain stalks, and there was movement in the corpses – his grandfather wanted to go and see these still alive villagers, who had not yet died. He raised his face up, and saw that his grandfather's face, which was covered with rust stains and no longer human, spoke volumes.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): High sorghum seeds moaned, corpses shifted in the piles beneath his feet; Father wanted to call out to Granddad, to see if those unfinished business thoughts of his were not making their way down through the pores on Granddad's bronze face and ear him.

chinese: 他拿起一副走到车外戴上，透过镜片看到的城市夜景没有变化，只是暗了些，这时他才想起要将开关打开，立刻，城市化作一团团朦胧的光晕，大部分亮度固定，还有一些闪烁或移动着。
english: He put the glasses on and looked around. The city looked the same as before, only dimmer. Then he remembered that he had to switch them on. The city turned into many hazy glowing halos. Most were fixed, but a few flickered or moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He placed a pair of glasses on his head and looked out through the window. The cityscape outside did not change, just becoming darker, as he realized that he had forgotten to turn on the switch. Immediately, the city became a swirling mass of vague light, with most brightness set at fixed points, but some were moving or changing slightly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He grabbed a mirror-and wore it back again to the car, where he looked through the glass at the cityscape. Nothing changed. Then, one by one, the night turned pale until there was utter darkness. Soon, the clouds gathered around him like a string of slits in a hat, blurring the visibility of buildings, moving with each blink or movement.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He took off his glasses and walked outside, putting them back on as he went inside. The city night scene didn’t change much; it was just darker. He then realized that he had to turn the lights on. Instantly, everything became a blur of light, with most of it fixed and some flickering or moving around.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: As he put on the glasses, he walked outside and turned up the lights. The night view of Shanghai had indeed changed for the better, just a bit darker. Only after he did this did he remember to leave the lights on—then the city transformed itself into a tangled mass of shifting glowing lights, most of which remained bright except for a few flickering ones.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He took out a pair of glasses and put them on his head as he drove away from the city. The cityscape outside changed slightly but remained dark. Then he realized that he had forgotten to turn on the switch, so he immediately opened it and found himself surrounded by a cloud-like mist of light. Most of the brightness was fixed, while some were moving or changing.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He picked up a mirror and fastened it to his belt, observing the cityscape through the glass window of his car. Nothing changed as he fled inside. Suddenly he remembered that he needed to turn the switch on. As soon as he did, the pixels in the window began flickering and the clouds in the城市的气氛中出现了骚动。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He picked up a pair of sunglasses and walked out of the car. As he put them on, he noticed that the city's night scene had not changed, just looked darker. Only then did he remember turning on the switch. Immediately, the city became a mass of hazy lights, most of which were fixed, but there were still some flickering or moving ones.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As he put on the new pair of glasses, the city landscape outside changed little, but not surprisingly the lights were a bit brighter. He just had time to remember to turn on the generator before the entire city turned into a tangled mass of orange, red, and blue lights, most of which flickered or drifted across the screen.

chinese: 夜色灰葡萄，金风串河道，宝蓝色的天空深邃无边，绿色的星辰格外明亮。 北斗勺子星——北斗主死，南斗簸箕星——南斗司生、八角玻璃井——缺了一块砖，焦灼的牛郎要上吊，忧愁的织女要跳河…… 都在头上悬着。
english: On that grey-purple night a golden breeze followed the course of the river. The sapphire-blue sky was deep and boundless, green-tinted stars shone brightly in the sky: the ladle of Ursa Major (signifying death), the basket of Sagittarius (representing life); Octans, the glass well, missing one of its tiles; the anxious Herd Boy (Altair), about to hang himself; the mournful Weaving Girl (Vega), about to drown herself in the river. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The night is gray with grapes, the wind blows across the river, the blue sky stretches far beyond, the green stars shine brightly. The constellation of the北斗七星 – the star that has died, the constellation of the southern zodiac – the constellation of the eight corner glass jars – the missing piece of a brick, burning hot, and troubled the bumble bee must jump over the river… They hang on their heads.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The night was as dark as grapes, the black sky is unshakable. The blue sky is infinite without bound. The green stars are particularly bright. The star of North Pole – The primeval of the north stars. The one of South Pole – The home of the southern stars. The one of Ender's Ring – The dead of the Ender's ring. All of them hang from their heads. They all have the same task: To lift Up the unhappy unhappy wife of trouble (the one of North Pole) and to Jump Into the freezing river (the one of South Pole).
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: At night, there is a gray grape vine, golden wind through the river, deep blue sky, and bright green stars. The two main stars of the Southern Cross – the Swordfish and the Dipper – represent death and life respectively. The Glass Crock – with one brick missing – represents a burning pot. The starry sky above the lonely farmer’s house is full of problems. He has to decide whether he should hang himself or jump into the river… They are all hanging over his head.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Under the dark sky, red windswept water channels crisscrossing the muddy river bed, sending down golden rays of dawn; deep blue stars shone far away, more brightly than the neighbouring Milky Way, and here and there there were broken tiles from a underground well, and, above all heaven, the lonely牛郎星 and the unhappy weaver waiting at the mouth of the well were held up by their magic links.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The night is gray with grapes, the wind carries a river of gold, blue skies shimmering undulating forever, green stars shine bright like diamonds. The compass star – the star that died, the constellation star – the constellation that was born; eight corner glass jars – one missing a piece of a brick, burning hot, the girl with the moon must be hanging up from the window. She is all over her head.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The night seemed to turn out dark blue, because of the cloudy wine-gold sky. The blue sky was unending. Green mirror stars were bright. The star of the七星座—the southmost main constellation was missing, the one of the eight corners—the one of the箕星—hung a mile away from the constellation's center, the one of the corner boulders—were all hanging from the head. And the other four corners—of the primeval Milky Way—the ones with the rose-shaped stars—were too bright.]
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: At night, there was a gray grape, golden wind passing by the river, deep blue sky with bright stars, and green stars were even brighter than usual. The North Star was like a spoon, while the South Star looked like a basket, and the Eight-angled glass well was missing a brick, so the anxious shepherd wanted to hang himself, while the sad maiden wanted to jump into the river… They were all hanging on the head.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Underneath the grey skies, golden windswept canals glimmer with gold, deep blue heavens so dark they seem infinite, and green stars more brightly shining than any on earth. All the constellations of these enchanted skies are held suspended above humans' heads: Cowherd hanging onto a rock,织女跳入河中的哀音……

chinese: 叶文洁试着在工作中麻木自己，以便忘掉过去——她竟然几乎成功了，一种奇怪的自我保护本能使她不再回忆往事，不再想起她与外星文明曾经有过的联系，日子就这样在平静中一天天过去。
english: Ye tried to numb herself with work so as to forget the past—and almost succeeded. Her life passed this way, day after day, in tranquility.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Ye tried to numb herself in her work and forget her past — even success seemed to have nailing down her connection with the alien civilization. chinese: 韦小宝想要打手势叫她别说，却又不敢移动手臂。
english: When Trinket heard the old eunuch's question, he wanted to signal to Blossom not to let on that he was there, but dared not risk even moving his hand.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket wanted to point his hand at her, but was too shy to move his arm.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct:
In the original text, "韦小宝" translates as "Wu Xiao Ba" which is a character from the popular Chinese animated series "South Park". The phrase "想要打手势叫她别说，却又不敢移动手臂" seems to be a reference to the character's inability to use his hands or move them at all. However, since there isn't any direct translation for this part of the text, I will just provide you with the sentence without any additional information:

"他想用手势来阻止她说话，但又害怕自己的手会移动而不能控制自己。"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He was at a loss what to do. Nothing his smarting could do was to move his arms.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoya was about to say something when he saw that he could not move his arm.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket was about to shout at her not to say anything more, but was too nervous to move his arms.

chinese: 那宾馆区的灯光却因为天地楼群的大和高，显得有些寂寥，却是璀璨的寂寥，有一些透心的快乐似的。

chinese: 他自觉得胜，心下高兴，只是小郡主不会说话，未免有些扫兴，要想去解她穴道，却又不知其法，说道：“你给人点了穴道，倘若解不开，不能吃饭，岂不饿死了？

'If they're not opened, you'll just starve to death.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But as far as he was concerned all along the length of the chamber the little count was unaware that there was this little confusion in his mind; but for the most part all along the length of the chamber he had been keeping a close watch on the Little Countess, and hoped that by some means or other she would reveal the truth to him to his relief; but however he might interpret the old testament he could not see how to do it. 'Well, if Her Ladyship gave me a headache,' he said, 'I shall probably not be able to feed myself for some time. It seems like a饥饿的毕现。'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He felt that he was superior, feeling very happy. However, since the young lady could not speak, it was somewhat disappointing. If one wanted to open her up, they did not know how to do so. He said, "If you were given a point of pressure, if one could not open it up, would not one be starving to death?

He reflected that her inability to speak was making the situation all the more depressing for her, and he went up to her and began: 'If they've closed your pores, my dear, you'll starve; starvation's far worse than being blocked up. You ought to realise that!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He felt he was in a good mood, but his heart was not happy; the little prince would not speak, that would be rather unfortunate, and he did not know how to get her out of her way, saying "If you give me the key to my door, I will never eat again, what a pity!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But as far as he was concerned he was superior in every respect to the other two, and therefore seemed to be on the right side of the matter; but he had no knowledge at all of the methods by which the Little Countess would be allowed to open her wound. 'If you gave her a while to recover, you wouldn't be able to give her food until she's fully recovered,' he thought. 'It would be a grievous disappointment to her if she never recovered completely.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He felt that he had won and was pleased with himself but he would be disappointed if he could not help her because she was too young to speak. He wanted to open her meridians but did not know how to do it. "If you were to be made to eat something, what would happen? You might starve to death!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He felt better as the girl ceased complaining. However, this seemed to have little effect on the latter, and though he very much wanted to help her (he had learned that it was extremely difficult but worth trying), he did not know what the best way was, and could only say: 'Someone's put you under a bandage. If you can't get them unbound, you won't be eating any more! It will kill you!'

english: To those who stood around the bed and watched him while this was happening he appeared first to be holding up the mirror and looking into it, then to let it drop; then to open his eyes in a ghastly stare and pick it up again; then, as it once more fell from his grasp, he finally ceased to move.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The person standing behind him was just watching him with his eyes on the mirror as it fell down, so he raised his head again and picked up the mirror in his hand. After that, the mirror dropped onto his hands and remained motionless.

chinese: 这地方一上来就显得有些没心肺，无忧虑，是因为它没来得及积蓄起什么回忆，它的头脑里还是空白一片，还用不着使用记忆力。

chinese: 他想着：“兄弟们一并都有父母教训，何必我多事，反生疏了。 况且我是正出，他是庶出，饶这样看待，还有人背后谈论，还禁得辖治了他？”
english: 'We are both equally subject to our parents' control,' he would say of himself and Jia Huan. 'Why should I create a greater distance between us by trying to control him myself – especially when I am the wife's son and he is the concubine's? People already talk behind our backs, even when I do nothing. It would be ten times worse if I were to start bossing him about.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought: "My brothers have parents who also taught me, why should I do so? And then there's that, and I am a man of right, he is a woman of wrong; how can we view this with such an attitude, and still be talking about it behind his back?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Well,' thought the boy, 'his parents must have gone down good memory on all three of them, so he could hardly hope to get any pleasure out of making a fool of himself; besides, I'm only as old as him, really. He can go off to raise his parents—but I shall just have to keep my opinion to myself, and if anyone tries to gossip about me behind my back, they will get me in监牢里！」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He thought, "Why should I be the one to deal with it? It's better if I just let them handle it." Furthermore, he was a natural son while his brother was a bastard child. He would rather they didn't speak ill of him, much less talk about him behind his back.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Things are worse than I feared,' was what Mr. Oi-poi was thinking as he finished eating. The boy had no such kin to discipline him; nor, being a child of higher birth, did he need attending to in quite the same way that he did. He could go as he liked, and even if anyone did talk behind his back, there was not much Master Yu-ming could do about it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He thought: "My brothers also have parents' instructions, why should I do more than they do? And besides being a man of honor, he is a poor outcast; what if we consider this differently? And could there be anyone behind me who talks about him or even controls him?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That's very well said,' he thought. 'My parents and all of their brothers will have had their parents' instructions before they come here. What if, a year or two later, I came across one of my children who had been adopted? I shall be able to reply to them as best I can, but then nobody would dare accuse me for being mean. I can just keep on living my life as normal.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He thought: "My brothers have also been reared by their parents; why should I be so troublesome? It's even more awkward that I am the eldest while he is the youngest."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That's what I'm for!' thought Ogier. ‘Younger brothers have their parents to teach them; why should it be my fault if I don't know him? At any rate, though I am the main one coming out, he is the crudest of the lot; so even if there is any backbiting going on, there is nobody to boss me!’

chinese: 父亲怔怔地看着爷爷。 父亲的双眼大睁，从那两粒钻石一样的瞳孔里，散射出本来属于我奶奶的那种英勇无畏、狂放不羁的响马精神，那种黑暗王国里的希望之光，照亮了我爷爷的心头。
english: Father stared wide-eyed and fearfully at Granddad. The glare in his diamondlike pupils embodied the heroic, unrestrained spirit of Grandma, a flicker of hope that shone and lit up Granddad's heart.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The father stared at his grandfather with wide eyes. The two diamond-shaped pupils emitted a kind of outlaw spirit that belonged to my grandmother, brave and fearless, wild and free. That light shone brightly on my grandfather's heart.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The father looked at his grandfather with a blank expression on his face. His eyes were open as though he had seen all the brilliance that was bestowed upon him by his grandmother's bravery and indomitable spirit, which is the light of hope in the dark realm.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes widened with amazement. Through the dots in his eyes he was reminded of the courageous, bold young man who had died long ago, the kind of man who'd sailed through the dark world like a shining sign of hope in the night.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Father stared at his grandfather. Father's eyes were wide open; from those two diamonds of his gaze, he could see the bravery and wildness that belonged to my grandmother. That fierce, courageous spirit of the bandits in the dark kingdom, shining like a light in my grandfather's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes, which had been round with astonishment, seemed to have left their two diamond-like sockets and focused on Grandma's. chinese: 这时间的电车，多是些家庭主妇般的女人，手里拎着布袋，身上的旗袍是有皱痕的，腿后的丝袜也没对准缝，偏了那么一点，头发或是蓬乱，或是理发店刚出来戴了一顶盔似的，脸上表情也是木着的，万事俱不关心的样子。
english: Most of the passengers at that time of the day were housewives with cloth bags in hand, wearing wrinkled cheongsams, the seams of their stockings running crookedly up the back of their legs. They either had messy, disheveled hair or, if they had just walked out of the beauty salon, hair that look like a helmet. Their faces were rigid, as if nothing in the world concerned them.

The stockings at her feet were not aligned, and she was slightly off. Her hair was disheveled or uncleaned, and her hairdresser had just come out looking like he was bald. His face expressions were all gray.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The cars were filled with women of middle age: ladies with long coats fluttering about their formal skirts, their stockings mismatched, the sewing errors in their gait and the mismatched headgear not fitting properly. Their hair was in disarray; electric梳子是在它们头上的,正欲戴回的一对理发师。脸上也是漠落的表情,好像一切都不重要。

Their dresses have wrinkles, their stockings don't match, and they're a bit off-center at the back. Their hair may be wild or combed like a barber just came out of the shop, and their expressions show no care for anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The trolley was filled with women, apparent owners of no great cares, whose baskets said, 'I bought this food at the farmer's market today,' and whose dresses showed signs of wear. The wires between their legs were not perfectly straight; their stockings were off precisely by a sliver, and their hair was either frizzed or permed. They looked, if not emotionally invested in anything, then at least uninterested in everything.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The time train was a time machine that is often portrayed as a woman of household clothes, holding bags with strings of wrinkles on her body. The stockings on her legs have some creases, and her hair or bangs were not pointed at the right place. There was a slight deviation from where she was pointing it. Her face expressions were cold, and her face looked like a bald person after being shaved by a barber shop.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The buses were filled with women of middle age, whose coats were badly worn, their faces were never facing the waistcloth, their hair was loose or arranged nicely behind her curtain, and the places around their eyes always seemed interested—their faces were expressionless as the dawn of another day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This time the electric trolley is mostly women who carry shopping bags on their backs. Their silk stockings have not been sewn perfectly. They wear hair that either has frizz or a hairdo with a helmet-like top hat. Their faces look wooden. They don’t care about anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Their voices were soft, their hands were full of handbags, their clothing was creased by the weight of daily life, the worn-out stockings slipped down just a little, like fingers that had been picked up from the side of the street rather than neatly sewn into a pair of slacks; their hair was either frizzled or freshly permed from the cut at the hair salon and their faces were blank with boredom.

chinese: 奶奶嫁到单家，其实也是天意。 那天，我奶奶在秋千架旁与一些尖足长辫的大闺女耍笑游戏，那天是清明节，桃红柳绿，细雨霏霏，人面桃花，女儿解放。
english: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was the will of heaven, implemented on a day when she and some of her playmates, with their tiny bound feet and long pigtails, were playing beside a set of swings. It was Qingming, the day set aside to attend ancestral graves; peach trees were in full red bloom, willows were green, a fine rain was falling, and the girls' faces looked like peach blossoms. It was a day of freedom for them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Grandmother married to a single family is also part of destiny. That day, I was playing with some tall and pointed long hair girls at the swings on the springboard, it was Qingming Festival, red flowers, rain, people face flower, daughter liberated.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: To marry Shan Xi-feng, her future husband, Grandma had also been meant to be. On a day I recall as Qingming Festival, when the flowers of spring were in full bloom and light drizzling fell from the sky, she was playing on the tummy of a秋千, laughing and joking with girls with pigtails and veil.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Grandma married to a single family is really fate. That day, when my grandmother was playing with some pointed high-heeled long hair girls on the swings at the grandhouse, it was Qingming Festival, which was red, green, and rainy, people were looking at the flowers of a daughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grandma had arrived at this new home with the help of her aunt on the day of the dead, where she played games with some solo tall-headed women, laughing at their strange looks — it was a day for remembrance of the dead.

That day, my grandma played games with some tall girls with long hair tied at the end of the swing, that day was Qingming Festival, there were peach blossoms and green willow trees, it was light rain, people looked like flowers, daughters were freed.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Grandma married into the Shan family, it was meant to be, too. On the day she was to be married, she went to the swing in front of her house, along with some girls from her wedding reception who were as tall as pines and as luscious as willows; that day was Cherry Blossom Festival, and spring rain was falling in a drizzling curtain. Women's faces turned pink, and blossoms fell like petals.

chinese: 胡思乱想，一夜也不曾合眼。

The Wilkinson high-resolution radio spectrum observatory that was to be launched in 2003 failed to go into operation in 2009 when the European Space Agency announced its intention to cancel the experiment. In 2012, the European Space Agency launched the Planck space telescope, which provides even more precise detection of the cosmic microwave background than WMAP.

chinese: 轿夫抬轿从街上走，迈的都是八字步，号称“踩街”，这一方面是为讨主家欢喜，多得些赏钱； 另一方面，是为了显示一种优雅的职业风度。
english: As the bearers carried their load down the path, their feet left a series of V imprints known as 'tramples' in the dirt, for which satisfied clients usually rewarded them, and which fortified the bearers' pride of profession.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The porter carried a轿子在街道上行走，every step was an八字步，a symbol of what they wanted from their customers; this meant that they were trying to show off their profession's elegance.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: When the sedan bearers carried them down the streets of Shanghai, they walked in circles called 'circles of recall' , in order to please their masters. The former是为了取笑镇压主家的喜庆,而后面的目的是要在求职时给人留下深刻的印象。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The porter walked down the street with his feet together, known as "walking the streets" because he was supposed to please his master and get more money. This is both for showing off a refined profession's style and for pleasing his master.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The bearers marched in a八字 formation through the streets, which they refer to as'踩街'. This isn't just for improving their grading score: it's also showiness: demonstrating elegance in a demanding job.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The driver of the carriage is walking on the street as if he is walking with a round step, which is said to be a sign that he was enjoying his customers' favor and receiving some money. In addition, this act was intended to show a professional style of life.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When bearers raise the coffin on a journey, it is usually along the八字边走, so is known as the 'crouching cobra'. This is because it gives rise to some bribes to the主人; but more importantly it gives them an opportunity to display a certain professional class of courtesy.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Lodgers carried poles along the streets, walking with their feet on a step, known as "walking the streets". This was done both to please the owner and for the sake of showing off an elegant professional style.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They swung their poles in a pattern known as the 'street dance,' by which they could win the favour of the主人, who would award them payment; but mainly, it was a manner of doing justice to their glamorous profession.

chinese: 因见上面大旨不过谈情，亦只是实录其事，绝无伤时诲淫之病，方从头至尾抄写回来，闻世传奇。
english: He could see that its main theme was love; that it consisted quite simply of a true record of real events; and that it was entirely free from any tendency to deprave and corrupt. He therefore copied it all out from beginning to end and took it back with him to look for a publisher.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Because they did not just make a point of describing how things were, but instead recorded the facts directly; there was no harm in seeing through them or spreading them around like a virus; I will copy all this back from beginning to end, so that people can hear about it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: From this we learn that what Her Cry says concerns 'counseling a bride to choose her husband's course', and that all it records is 'a true account of the circumstances which led up to her visit'. It does not contain any passages which might be considered for purposes of remembrance on account of its unexciting contents, nor contains a single word which appears to have been interpolated for the purpose of obscenity. The story is told in the annals of Mirolificquent Legend.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Because what is being talked about above is mainly talking about love, it's just a record of events, and there is no disease of indulging in lust for time and teaching. I have been writing from the beginning to the end and heard the world's legends.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: O, how splendidly you reveal themselves in these pages! How, I say, diligently you record each of your moments! And what, I ask, a binding lesson of morality holds between us? That we all delight in telling one another tales of love.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Because the main point of this passage is not about romance but rather factual evidence; there is no illness of love at all, so I should just write everything back from head to tail. When we have a story that has been told over and over again, we will hear it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): From this we learn that the man had been told not to discuss love; and therefore, what he wrote down was strictly a record of what had actually happened, without any unhealthy elements of revenge or sensuality. He had merely returned the pages from the top to the bottom, eager to share his story with the world.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Because what is written above is not talking about love but just a record of events, there is no disease of slander or lust. I have copied everything from the beginning to end and will be published soon."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Observing that the letter was concerned solely with the course of their conversations and that there was no scandalous or profane matter it contained, he decided to copy the whole of the diary down and publish it as a novel for immoral amusement.

chinese: 这刘老老方安顿了，便说道：“我今日带了你侄儿，不为别的，因他爹娘连吃的没有，天气又冷，只得带了你侄儿奔了你老来。”
english: Having all this while had time to collect herself, Grannie Liu began her speech again: 'The real reason I have brought your little nephew here today is because his Pa and Ma haven't anything in the house to eat, and the weather is getting colder, and – and – I thought I'd bring him here to see you...'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: This is what Liu Ge, who was taking care of his nephew, said: "I brought you a son yesterday; I didn't bring him other than that, because he doesn't have anything for his father and mother, and the weather is very cold today, so he had to take you to be with me when I go to see my old man."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Curious! ' said Grannie Liu when she had spoken of her next-of-kin to be安置下安葬: 'I've brought my nephew so that he can have something to eat, and it's not that his father has died of illness; he just happens to have come because there's been no food for some time and it's getting cold.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Liu Old Master was settled, so he said: "I brought my nephew with me today, not for anything other than the fact that his parents have no food, it is cold out, so I brought him here."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Once more Grannie Liu found herself wondering if she had offended her. 'Today,' she began to say, 'I've brought my nephew to see you. They've brought us here only because they're worried about me.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: This is how Liu Tao took care of his son, without any other reason, because he did not have enough food for his parents. The weather was cold and they had to bring him along with him as well.

He will get enough from his father's kitchen, though,' she continued, looking to her watch-moment as she spoke. 'If he were brought in straight, he would run the risk of getting sick.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Liu's old man is settled down. He said, "I brought your nephew today not for any other reason but because his parents don't have anything to eat. It's cold outside too so I brought him here."

chinese: 你身上中的毒，旁人没解药，我终究是有的。 小娃娃，你到底是受了谁的指使，想这计策来弄瞎我眼睛？
english: Now then, no one else has an antidote for this poison but me, so why don't you be a good little boy and tell me who you are working for? Who was it that put you up to blinding me?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The poison you're carrying is on your body; there's no cure for it among the others. I'm the one who's got this plot, so that's what I have!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I had to make up for you by resorting to funny stuff. Well, last time I was抽检不合格, it must have been someone else's. So I've got you the solution, Miss! But who is your target? Who gave you the idea?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The poison on your body is one I have. A child, who was it that ordered you? To make my eyes blind with this plan?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Well now, if you're one of those unlucky souls who's had the毒药 injected into them without any antidote available … Well, let me tell you this, young man: I've got a greater certainty as to who's been behind all this than you do. Who, then, is the principal behind all this? And who was the principal behind making you think you needed seeing blind?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The poison inside your body is mine, and no one can help me. The little boy, what did you do to me? You have got me here by myself, right?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've done my share. The people around you haven't had any medicine, so I've had to get some help myself. The boy's your son. Where did you think of thinking of me because you thought of trying to mend the sight in my eyes with this little plot?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The poison on your body is something I have. A child, what master has ordered you to plot against me?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now that there's such a heavy spell on you, other people can see it's impossible, but there's certainly something behind all this which I can undo. What was it your master wanted you to do?

chinese: 一家四口，以务农为业。 因狗儿白日间自作些生计，刘氏又操井臼等事，青板姊弟两个无人照管，狗儿遂将岳母刘老老接来，一处过活。
english: The four of them depended on agriculture for their living, and since, with Gou-er himself busy most of the day on the land and his wife busy about the farm drawing water, pounding grain, and the like, there was no one to look after Qing-er and her little brother, Gou-er invited his mother-in-law, old Grannie Liu, to come and live with them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: A family of four, who have been farming. For a while, their father had been managing the wellhouse work for his own interests. Their youngest daughter, Qingbao, was left in charge of the two sisters who were not taking care of them when they were out during the day. The dog then took the place of the elder sister, Tiaowu, who was unable to take care of her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: FAMILY AND FRIENDS: THE THOUSAND TROUBLELEYS OF GOD-ERFCENT IS WORKING AS A AGGREGATE FOR HOMELIFE. Because his activities with dogs during the day time were not well received by his grandparents, it was now decided that dog-days should be used as an means of livelihood for the family; yet there was no one among the girls who could look after Grannie Liu's affairs. So it was that dog-day had been transformed into a set of chores for the entire family, and thus Granddad's wife had been able to find ways to get about among them, even masquerading occasionally as workaday.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: A family of four. They make a living by farming. Because the dog is making some money during the day, Liu's wife also does household chores. The two young girls have no one to look after them. So the dog has taken his mother-in-law Liu Old Mother from her son's home and they all live together now.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: This was of old a family of two generations: Father, Mother, and twins Brother and Sister Yu. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A family of four. They were farmers by occupation. Because the dog would make some money during the day, Liu's wife also had to do chores such as grinding rice and washing clothes. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): We calculated the cost of our shopping and walked home.

chinese: 群狗一哄而散，坐得远远的，呜呜地咆哮着，贪婪地望着死尸。
english: The howling dogs scattered, then sat on their haunches once they were out of range, setting up a deafening chorus of angry barks as they gazed greedily, longingly at the corpses.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The dogs ran away from each other, sitting far apart, howling with a deep cry and looking on in hunger.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The dogs scattered and hid themselves far from the corpse, howling bitterly and screeching with a desire to eat their own blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The pack of dogs scattered, sitting far away, howling, and gazing at the corpse greedily.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The pack聚集成团，向四面散开，一边狺狺吠着，一边小心翼翼地窥视着尸体。
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A group of dogs ran off in a panic, sitting far away from each other, howling in despair and staring at the dead corpses.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The dogs quickly ran off, their fur standing up on end; they sat motionless in front of the corpse, howling bitterly and staring long-sightedly into the abyss.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The pack of dogs scattered like madmen, standing far away from the corpse, barking viciously and greedily.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The pack burst out running, screeching and growling, as though they were baying at the dead.

chinese: 韦小宝道：“我跟海老公。”
english: 'I'm with Hai Goong-goong.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Let me introduce myself to you Mr. Hong," he said.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I'm with Old Hai.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Xiaopai said, "I'm with Captain Sea."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I've got to see Old Hai.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Is it a pleasure for me to meet you?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm跟他吵架.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaohong said: "I'm with my uncle."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've been stuck there with Old Hai.'

chinese: 平安里的夜晚其实也是有许多想头的，只不过没有王琦瑶窗帘上的大花朵，映显不出来罢了。 许多想头都是沉在心底，沉渣一般。 全是叫生计熬炼的，挤干汁，沥干水，凝结成块，怎么样的激荡也泛不起来。
english: There was a great deal of thinking going on around Peace Lane, but much of it, like sediment, had sunk to the bottom of people's hearts, all the juice squeezed out of them, so that they had solidified and could no longer be stirred up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In the night of Peace Village, there were many thoughts too. But it was just that they didn’t have a large flower on the curtains of Ouyang Guo’s window. It was merely a display of it. Many thoughts were buried deep within them, like sediment. Everything was about survival. They squeezed out the sweat, dried off the water, condensed into blocks, how could their emotions be sustained?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: 平安里夜晚并非一个碌碌无为、毫无奢望可念的景象，而是许多人皆有心却都未能写进日志之中，甚至于窗幔上未见花般繁复艳丽的大朵花朵，也不得轻易显露出来，都在暗箱中默默沉思磨练，将一线一线的小物凝结成团，如何激荡也无法掀开。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The night in the Peaceful is also full of thoughts, but it does not show through Wang Qi'ao's curtains with flowers, because there is no way to reveal them. Many thoughts are buried deep in the heart, like dust. They are all caused by daily life, squeezed out of their juices, dried up, and condensed into blocks. How can they rise?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In Peace Lane, however, everything has many possibilities, just that they never quite make it to the surface, much like Wang Qiyao's large flowers that do not have room to grow against the dark background. These are people and circumstances that must struggle every day to survive; after squeezing the juice out of their lives, the result is a substance so dry that it barely resembles its former self.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In the evening of Peace Village, there was also a lot of headspace for people, but no big flower on Wang Qiu'er's curtains. It is just a reflection of that. Many of these thoughts are hidden inside their hearts, like a thick layer of sand. All of them are laboring with money, draining sweat, condensing into something solid, how could they even stir up the waves?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Nighttime along Peace Lane is not all melancholy; one simply needs to look inside to experience it. There, as so many people would admit, there are few beautiful flowers on the curtains, and from which one mustality of thoughts be squeezed out and frozen for dear life, from which nothing rises to spring.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The night in Peaceful Place is also full of thoughts, but without the big flowers on Wang Qiaoyue's curtains, they cannot be revealed. Many thoughts are buried deep within one's heart, like a waste material. They all come from the pressure of living a life. The thought bubbles will not rise up because it has been squeezed dry and dried out.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But at night, everything takes on a new significance; there is no need for curtains to reveal it. Many a disturbing thought floats around in the air beneath Wang Qiyao's large flowers, hidden away somewhere deep down. Years ago, life back then was much tougher, but in the course of living out day after day, people had learned to filter out the激越，思想水分挥发，凝成一层坚硬的晶状体，却依然不堪重负，总是波澜迭出，翻腾不止。

chinese: 这种弄堂的房屋看上去是鳞次栉比，挤挤挨挨，灯光是如豆的一点一点，虽然微弱，却是稠密，一锅粥似的。
english: Apartment structures are built virtually on top of one another, cheek by jowl, breathing down upon each other's necks. Their lights are like tiny glowing peas, not very bright, but dense as a pot of pea porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: This shophouses look like a cluster of buildings, packed tightly and dimly lit. Even though it is faint, they are dense, just like a soup pot.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The Shanghai longtang look like ever-growing ditches: the curtains seem numbered; the streetlights shine one after another, faintly like grains; but even though they are few and far between, you can note their dense concentration.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The houses of this alleyway look like they are stacked on top of each other, crammed closely together, with dim light here and there, even though it is weak, it is dense, like a pot of porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sort of longtang in the city are arranged side by side, row upon row; they glow with a few glimmering lights, though even that glimmer is not spiky but dense, spreading out like a thick soup.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The apartment buildings appear like a series of rows of bricks with brick after brick, all packed tight together, while the lighting is just a dot on a dot, weak but dense.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The apartments of these longtang look like consecutive bumpers squeezed together into a分布式光线显然不是太强，却却密密匝匝的，如同很不紧不慢的一锅粥。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This row house is like a maze, packed together with all kinds of people, lights flickering from here and there, even though it's dim, it is dense, like a pot of porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Despite their density, the longtang apartments appear crowded with tiny lamps of scattered light, even though the total output is modest.

chinese: 薛蟠道：“要不是，我也不敢惊动：只因下月初三日，是我的生日，谁知老胡和老程他们，不知那里寻了来的：这么粗，这么长，粉脆的鲜藕；这么大的西瓜；这么长，这么大的暹罗国进贡的灵柏香熏的暹罗猪、鱼。
english: 'Look,' said Xue Pan. 'I wouldn't have troubled you otherwise, only it's my birthday on the third of next month and old Hu and old Cheng and a couple of the others, I don't know where they got them from but they've given me: a piece of fresh lotus root, ever so crisp and crunchy, as thick as that, look, and as long as that; a huge great melon, look, as big as that; a freshly-caught sturgeon as big as that; and a cypress-smoked Siamese sucking-pig as big as that that came in the tribute from Siam.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: 薛蟠道：“要是不这样，我恐怕不敢冒犯：因为月末三天，是我的生日，谁知道老胡和老程他们，不知道从哪里弄来的：这样的粗，这样的长，粉脆的鲜藕；这么大，这么大，大的西瓜；这么大，这么大，大名鼎鼎的暹罗猪、鱼。”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I hope it's because,' said Xue-er, 'that you would have been surprised to discover my little plot; but I can imagine that the Reptiles and Amphibians you mean would have made quite a nice surprise for me: fifteen feet long! Two inches thick! Purely collection of purest most perfect purest most perfect fresh sweet potato chunks! Long legs! Large fish! And large potted herbs and plants—sweet cabbage, longosaurus from Thailand, or pangulas from China.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wang Zhepan said, "I wouldn't have done it if I hadn't been forced to." He continued, "It was on the thirtieth of the lunar month that my birthday was; I didn't know where these guys were from until I saw them. These aren't ordinary people. They're not even peasants. They're like a big man with a long beard. The pork is so large that you could fit two or three pigs inside it. The fish is so big that it's as long as your arm."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: I wouldn't have bothered if it didn't concern Old Chai,' said Xue Pan. 'It all starts on the thirtieth day of the first month. Yesterday was my birthday, and now I hear old胡和老程他们带来了这些东西: a big, thin leek as thick as a dancer's thigh and as crisp as popcorn, and a big, long silkworm cake from Thailand; and some of those fucking Thai pigs and fish that they're letting in.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: 薛蟠道：“不然的话，我不敢惊扰到：只因为下月三日是我生日，谁知道老胡和老程他们哪里来的？这么细又这么长，像新鲜的藕那样脆，像大西瓜那样大，像暹罗国送来的香薰的暹罗猪、鱼。”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If it were not for that I would not have bothered,' said Xiang Pan. 'But if I had known exactly what I was doing, I shouldn't have gone. I should have expected that by the month of January, Mr Jia and Mr Cheng would be back from their holidays, and that they would still be standing at the market offering their delicacies; that there should be huge heaps of fresh balsamic root, enormous plump Thai roots so long grown in the Phai Krong region of Thailand, giant pears so long grown in the Somnath Province of Vietnam.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Zehua said: "If I hadn't been there, I wouldn't have dared to wake you up either. It was on the 13th of the lunar month that my birthday was. I didn't know where those two old men had come from until today. They brought me this huge, long, thin, crisp, fresh water chestnut, a big, juicy watermelon, a long, fat, and very fragrant Siamese pig and fish."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I wouldn't have bothered to wake you in any case,' said Xue Pan. 'It all arrives on October 9th. I don't know where they got it all from— old胡、老程他们带来的。这么糙，这么短！这么鲜美的脆藕，这么大个的西瓜, 这里送来的泰国大使馆送来的檀香猪肉、鱼。

chinese: 麻雀肉味鲜美，营养丰富。
english: They were delicious.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The chicken meat is delicious and rich in nutrients.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Thinnessless bird lay a fit meal for me.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The meat of a parrot is very tasty and nutritious.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The young people said goodbye and made their way to the field to bag some pigeons for soup.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Pork is delicious and rich in nutrients.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Hatsu birds' feathers are a deliciously fresh and packed with rich protein.

chinese: 为此她没少发牢骚，严先生枕头上也立下千般愿，万般誓，不料公私合营，产业都归了国家，能保住一处私房就是天恩地恩，花园洋房终成泡影。
english: In response to her complaints, he had, in bed, promised many times to move them to a house with a garden. Now that their assets were controlled by the government, they felt lucky simply to be allowed to keep their house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: For her part, she has not spared any kind of belligerence; Prof. Liu also laid out a thousand promises on his pillow, and he vowed that no matter what happened, if the two countries were united, everything would be fine. But unfortunately, when they joined hands, it was their property that was taken over by the state. Only those who could stay with their private apartments in one place were entitled to heaven's mercy and earth's mercy. The garden flat had vanished from sight.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She not only gave her students a plethora of complaints, but that same Mr. Cheng also broke off all relations with the company, declaring his own home private and public property, and promising to share the fruits of his venture with the state if the joint enterprise were to be merged into the State. He even agreed to build a garden and mansion for himself in return for the share he'd gotten from the National Bank.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: For this reason she had not stopped complaining, and Mr. Yan made a thousand promises and vows on his pillow, but unfortunately, when public ownership was established, all of his private property belonged to the state, so he could only retain one piece of land as his heaven and earth blessings, which finally became a mirage for his garden and villa.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She got upset enough that Mr. Wang agreed on one condition: All his possessions would be nationalized, but he promised to keep one small patch of land under his name as a token of the state's mercy. Until his dreams ended, the family lived with the thought that their private domain would one day be restored to them as long as they maintained the property.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: She has complained a lot about him, and he has also made promises on her pillow, such as: "I will not give up my promise to the government; I have promised to take care of my private property, so that I can still live in my personal house even after it becomes a public one. My garden and villa will be lost forever."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She didn't mind venting her complaints, but Mr. Cheng had also promised to keep his word; to put his feelings aside, he could appreciate no fewer than a hundred+1 promises that his name would be recorded history and that his family would be able to call his home; but now, with the state enterprise being divided between the State and the Society, her feelings would never have been capable of holding out under such艰难的时运。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: For this reason she had not ceased complaining, and Mr. Yin had made a thousand vows and ten thousand promises on his pillow; yet when the reform of public ownership took place, all his property was confiscated, and he could only hold onto a private house as a blessing from heaven and earth. The garden mansion would eventually become a dream.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She got mad at him more than once; and he made a thousand words and promises to me that if he could only keep his trap shut and the two of them get on like old times, he'd give up his socialism for her sake. But now, upon nationalization, all personal property was nationalized, and even though he had managed to hold on to his share of the garden, it was gone, and their dream of an apartment in the French manner had vanished into thin air.

english: Mr. Cheng laughed, 'Of course I do.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Mr. Guo smiled: I know what you mean.

chinese: 韦小宝一鼓作气的走来，身上的疼痛倒也可以耐得，给蕊初这么一问，只觉得全身筋骨无处不痛，忍不住哼了一声。
english: The effort of getting to this appointment had absorbed so much of his attention that it had almost taken his mind off the pain; but as soon as she asked the question he became aware that he was hurting dreadfully all over and groaned in spite of himself.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The young man who was strong enough to stand up by himself walked over with a determined look on his face, and the pain in his body could also be endured, which made his sister蕊初感到浑身疼痛无比， she couldn’t help but raise her voice in response.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket appeared at Hushaicong's door again, this time with pain in his eyes. Butabella had more acquaintance with those old grunts than any; but when she asked him what was wrong, he gave a cry of some discomfort that told half the truth.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Wu Xiaoliao came forward with great effort. The pain he felt was bearable, but he could not help moaning as he realized that every part of his body ached.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Trinket took a page out of the old fighter's handbook and strode purposefully towards his enemy. By any standards he was in fine fettle; but against Rose, whatever was wrong with him seemed doubly painful. He winced.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Zai Ba is a man of strength who has already walked up to him with his body's pain. When he asked Budewang if there was anything that could make him feel better, she said that her whole body felt very painful. She couldn't help but laugh when she heard this.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket appeared at Hushaosun's door again, this time with pain in his eyes. But since Blossom had asked him, he came over. There was no need to complain about the pain in his eyes; all he could think was that there were so many other things he could complain about.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoliao came over with a spring in his step, but he could not bear the pain for long as it was too much. He grunted in pain.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket resumed his march with considerable spunk; but the pain in his limbs was such that a loud cry would have been unmercifully audible had it not been checked by a bolt of怒发冲冠的 determination. When he'd finished shouting, he hobbled on, silent but for the regular pain-soundings in his muscles and bones.

chinese: 看了心里有点欢喜，还有点起腻。 因她们站得远，听不见那里在说什么，只见有一个穿睡袍的女人躺在床上，躺了几种姿势，一回是侧身，一回是仰天，还有一回只躺了半个身子，另半个身子垂到地上的。 她的半透明的睡袍裹着身子，床已经皱了，也是有点起腻的。
english: Standing there watching they were quite excited, but at the same time irritated because they were too far away to hear what was being said on set. All they could see was a woman in a sheer nightgown lying on a bed with wrinkled sheets. She tried to lie in several different positions; on her side one moment, on her back the next, and for a while even in a strange position where half her body extended off the bed onto the floor. All this became somewhat boring.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: I was thinking of them when I had a small smile on my face. But something else made me happy. There were two women standing far away from me. They didn't hear what was said there. There was a woman in a sleepwear sleeping on one side, then on the other side she was sitting up and leaning over. Then there was another one who lay on half of her body, and the other half was lying on the ground. Her sleepwear covered her whole body, but it also had some weariness to it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She sometimes had the feeling that the women would tell some of the stories she read, perhaps with a bit of excitement. Because they were far from being born-players, they could not hear what was going on behind them; but there was something a tad bitting about the woman as she lay in her bed, lying various ways—on her side, with her head rested on the table; and仰面朝天…… their thin, translucent bedding gave the room a sort of toasty feel, as if the author was being nudged towards it from time on.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: There's a bit of pleasure as well as a little lust in his heart when he looks at them. Because they're standing far away, he can't hear what's going on there, so all he sees is a woman wearing her pajamas lying on the bed, with different positions: she's lying on her side, lying on her back, and lying half on her body while the other half is down on the ground. Her transparent pajama dress covers her body, and the bed has already creased up too.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: But as they stood right up, their hearts were a little bit happier—but then they were starting to feel a bit peevish because they could not hear what they were saying. They could only see a woman lying back on the bed, turnsideup, and turning side ways, also being seen from above. One shot was from below, another from above, and the body beneath the covers was enclosed in a transparent robe that hung down to the floor. The whole thing looked a bit boring and stale.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I was a little happy, and I also had some kind of attraction to them. Because they were so far away from me, I couldn't hear what was being said there. There was a woman in a sleeping robe sitting on one side, laying down in a half position, and then in the other hand, she was lying upside down. She was wrapped around her body with her sleeping robe. Her sleep robes covered her whole body. The bed was slightly wrinkled, which made it feel a bit like there was something stuck to her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She began to have a little hope, but before she knew it the women were no longer with her and the music they had once heard rise up from inside the room had disappeared. Still, all she could see was the woman herself, clothed in her sleeping robe, lying in various positions on the bed—on her side, maybe, with her head rested on the bed; on her hands, perhaps, with half of her body above the floor; and on the other half with its own form, probably bent over the floor. The dampening effect of the translucent curtain reminded her of some mild pleasure.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I felt a bit of happiness as well as some eroticism. They were standing too far away to hear what was happening there, but they could see a woman lying on her back, with different positions: side, front, half sitting up, half lying down. Her sheer nightgown covered her body, and the bed had wrinkles in it as well.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But as they stood off a bit, Wang Qiyao felt a bit of jealousy, though she made herself clear that it was silly of her to feel that way. The women sat on the edge of the bed, their legs crossed; they did not appear to be having any sex, but Wang Qiyao could not make out what they were saying because they were too loud for her to catch all of it. She could see the woman lying back, her heads turned towards the ceiling, one position with her upper body over the side of the bed, another with her lower body off the ground, and a third with her legs bent and her face up. All of them had been done from below. Her sleep mask completely covered her body, the bed was obviously in disarray, and the room seemed to be filled with the sound of sex.

chinese: 它们是上海弄堂的思想，昼里夜里都在传播。
english: They are the thoughts of Shanghai's longtang, disseminating themselves through day and night.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: They were Shanghai's thinking, night and day was spreading.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: These "in思想" are transmitted through day and night in Shanghai's longtang—the longtang of the nite sunlight and the sunverging day.

chinese: 因此刘老老看不过，便劝道：“姑爷，你别嗔着我多嘴：咱们村庄人家儿，那一个不是老老实实，守着多大碗儿吃多大的饭呢!
english: Grannie Liu could eventually stomach no more of his wife-baiting and intervened on her daughter's behalf. 'Now look here, son-in-law: probably you will think me an interfering old woman; but we country folk have to be grateful for what is in the pot and cut down our appetites to the same measure.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Therefore, Liu Gege was displeased. He said: "Daddy, don't be angry with me for talking too much. We are a village family, not a bunch of people who are always talking about what they want to eat and how much they want to drink.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He was interrupted by Grannie Liu with a long speech extending an invitation: 'If you refuse, your arse must be longer than a straight one; but it is the truth: in our village there are no lying wretches; they eat big enough even when they grow old—'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: So Liu old man was not pleased with this, so he said: "Young master, don't be angry at me for speaking my mind; we village people all have their own ways of living; they eat as much food as they can with what they have."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Grannie Liu intervened, speaking for her with a certain force that tended to make his anger worse. 'Goong-goong! You don't need to be cross with me. Don't you know that there's no such thing as the master not being mad enough for the job?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Therefore Liu old man is dissatisfied with him: he says, "Daddy, don't be angry at me too much: we are a village family, there are no big mouths that eat small plates!"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He was interrupted by Grannie Liu with a long speech extending a kindly message about good behaviour and faithful living. 'Never mind how many people you may be holding严正的' - said Grandma Liu - 'but just think of what it would be like if we'd lived in proper times back then. We had no mobile phones and no television sets. We ate the same kind of food.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: So Liu was annoyed and said, "Uncle Lu, don't scold me for speaking my mind. In our village, all of us eat a large bowl of rice whenever we have it."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grannie Liu intervened. 'Oh Uncle, you don't need to be angry, but haven't all of us in this village learnt to eat what we can afford? Don't you think there are plenty of people as well off as we are?

chinese: 他像喜鹊珍爱覆巢中最后一个卵一样珍爱着我父亲，但是，已经晚一点了，命运为他安排的更残酷的结局，已在前面路口上，胸有成竹地对他冷笑着。
english: He loved my father as a magpie loves the last remaining egg in its nest. But by then it was too late, for fate, cold and calculating, had sentenced him to a cruel end that was waiting for him down the road.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He cherishes me like a bird that treasures the last egg laid by my father, but he is too late for his own good now, as fate has arranged him with more cruel consequences than what he could have expected. He is standing calmly and coolly at the very front of the road, knowing how to laugh coldly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He cherished his father's memory, knowing that every additional egg would make the nest even fuller; but as it turned out that life had already preordained the fate of his grandfather, he smiled coldly at him, having pre-programmed the course of events at the entrance to the road in front.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: He loved my father as if he were cherishing the last egg of a鹊，but already it was too late，and the crueler fate that had been arranged for him was waiting at the next corner，smiling with coldness.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: He loved his father like a owl protecting its nest, but it was too late. The cruel end that had been pre-arranged for himself awaited him at the last intersection. He smiled wistfully as if he had planned this all along.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He treasures me father's last egg so much that he has been waiting for him like a rooster who loves the last nest in which his mother hatched. However, it is too late. Fate has arranged for him a harsher fate than what he had planned, just at the first crossing of the road.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He was as eager as the鹊朝 dew 拿着最后的一个卵在蛋盒里饲养小鸟一样对待父亲，但历史的天线已经倒转了轨道，命运用冰冷的目光决定了他的下场，在前面通往目的地的路上他已经做好了胸有定见的冷笑。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He loved my father as a hawk loves its last nest egg, but it was too late – his fate had already been arranged for him at the next corner, and he was looking down on him with a cold smile.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He loved his father like a nest-building owl, but it was too late. The more fortunate fate had prepared for him at the last minute with a much colder more cruel end awaiting him at the last crossing.

chinese: ‘谋事在人，成事在天’，咱们谋到了，靠菩萨的保佑，有些机会，也未可知。
english: 'Man proposes, God disposes. It's up to us to think of something. We must leave it to the good Lord to decide whether He'll help us or not. Who knows, He might give us the opportunity we are looking for.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Strategy is up to men, but success lies in the heavens," we have taken our chance, with the help of God's protection. Some opportunities may be unknown."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: No to do with people; only do something useful. We've got a chance, God be good; and believe me, there're a lot of them out there.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In affairs of men, it's all up to us; in matters of God, we can't do anything.' If we've managed to get things going, there may be some chance for success with a little help from above.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: You can plan anything out as long as you have faith that it will happen,' said Ovitz. 'With enough faith, luck must eventually come our way.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Strategy is in the people; success is in heaven," we've been planning this for a while, but if the gods are on our side, it might be possible that some things will happen."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): No to do with people; do things one at a time. Let chance find its path. Consider: What if we'd been able to find those opportunities? Well, you can believe in the Buddha,' said Dai-ru.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: In matters of fate, it is up to people; in matters of chance, it's all God can do,' we've got a good chance now, but there's still some uncertainty about what will happen.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): You can never quite plan everything,' you say, 'but if we do manage to plan something and机遇来到, who knows where it might lead?

chinese: 一时那男孩翻在上面，一时韦小宝翻在上面，翻了十七八个滚，终于两人互相扭住，呼呼喘气，突然之间，两人不约而同的哈哈大笑，都觉如此扭打十分好玩，慢慢放开了手。
english: They struggled for a while, each one gaining the upper hand for a moment, then going under, ringing the changes more than a dozen times, until finally they were in a complete deadlock, panting and staring fixedly at each other. And then suddenly, at exactly the same moment, they both burst out laughing. There was something about the clinch they were in that struck them both as terribly funny. Slowly they let go.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The boy who was on top of them suddenly turned around and said to his companion, "I am sorry, but I have something important to tell you."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: At once Trinket was back on top, followed by Trinket's rival; each time he found himself holding a handkerchief which he tugged at, yanking it out involuntarily with a groan. By some accident the two stood still for a minute—and suddenly both laughed loudly, which brought them down off their backs to let the other members of the party pull them along.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: At one time, the boy flipped over, at another time, so did Wei Xiaohong, rolling over seventeen or eighteen times before they finally grabbed each other's wrists, panting heavily. Suddenly, both of them burst out laughing together, finding it very funny to play with each other, and slowly letting go of their hands.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: After a few moments: Finally the boy and Trinket were turned over inside out, gasping for breath after the dozen or so twists and turns which followed. They stopped laughing, and seemed to be enjoying themselves; so releasing their grips, they paused for a while in the same position, their arms dangling limply down above their heads.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: One of them was on top of the table, while the other was on the floor. They were wrestling each other for seventeen times. Finally, they both turned their heads and began laughing together, all of them felt that this wrestling was quite amusing. After a while, they let go of their hands.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a few moments the boy was back on his feet, and soon afterward Trinket was back on top of him, but it took a couple of turns before Trinket found a way to grab hold of the other man by the leg and拧住他, then release him slowly, breathing heavily with laughter. He laughed out loud on every side, and got back to his normal life.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: At first the boy was on his back, then it was Hu Wu’s turn, he flipped around a few times before they both finally managed to hold each other by the wrists and began laughing out loud. They had never been so happy together that they decided to let go of their hands and walk away from each other.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a while this time the boy翻身压在韦小宝身上, and after rolling once or twice over each other's backs, they had reached a quite unusual position in which each of them was currently wearing the other's. They were tangled up inside out, and began giggling. It seemed to both of them an infinitely amusing position in which to be caught. After a while they gradually released each other's grips and stopped laughing.

chinese: 从路两边高粱地里飘来的幽淡的薄荷气息和成熟高粱苦涩微甘的气味，我父亲早已闻惯，不新不奇。
english: He was used to the delicate peppermint aroma and the slightly sweet yet pungent odour of ripe sorghum wafting over from the sides of the path – nothing new there.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The sweet little flavor of basil permeated the fields, and the crisp, bitter scent of those well-aged sorghum reminded Father Xue too muchly of his mother.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The faint aroma of mint from the high grass on either side of the road, mixed with the bitter sweetness of mature corn, is familiar to my father, who has grown accustomed to it, not new or strange.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: The faint fragrance of peppermint from the sorghum fields on both sides of the road did not surprise Father, whose senses had grown used to it long ago.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The aroma of thin mint from the tall stalks of the fields that used to carry him as he grew up is a familiar one, not new nor unusual.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sweet scotch-bye aroma mixed with the bitter scent of well-developed sorghum was familiar to Father; it seemed to suit this old house perfectly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The faint aroma of dill wafting from the high-corn fields on both sides of the road and the bitter sweetness of the dried corn reminded my father of nothing new or strange.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The smell of sweet peppermint from the fields beside the road did not surprise Father, whose senses had long grown used to it.

chinese: 高粱深处，蛤蟆的叫声忧伤，蝈蝈的唧唧凄凉，狐狸的哀鸣悠怅。

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: In the high plains below, the voice of a grain worm mourns; the howl of a frog is bitter; the lamentation of a fox is melancholy.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Deep in the sorghum field, huts growl melancholy, sparrows cluck bitterly, and foxst according to their mirth.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Deep in sorghum fields, frogs cry mournfully, grasshoppers sing desolate cries, and foxes wail painedly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Deep in the sorghum fields hares moan, frogs croak desolately, and pipers giggle mournfully, their howls lost in the darkness.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In the depths of the field of wheat, the cries of a frog's heart were sorrowful; the chirping of a cock was melancholic; the mournful cry of a fox was hauntingly beautiful.

chinese: 她订了一份晚报，黄昏时间是看报度过的，报上的每一个字她都读到，懂一半，不懂一半，半懂不懂之间，晚饭的时间便到了，炉子上的水也开了。
english: She subscribed to an evening newspaper to fill the hours of dusk. She read every word in the newspaper, making sense perhaps of half the reports. By the time she finished it, the water would be boiling and it would be dinner time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She has a newspaper subscription and she reads every word of it at night, but each word is explained or not explained at all, so there is half understanding and half misunderstanding between her and me. By dinner time, the water in the stove has opened up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She signed up for a newspaper at dinnertime, reading the daily headlines by the time she reached it, understanding only a portion of what was going on—and then she would know it was time to supper. By the evening, she would have learned enough about the world to cook dinner, even burning a drop of water for her stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: She subscribed to a daily paper, reading it at dinner time when the sun was setting. She read every word, but she didn't understand half of them. Halfway between understanding and not understanding, her dinner was ready, and the water on the stove boiled.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: She subscribed to a local newspaper and read it nightly during her evening quiet time. She understood most of the words, understanding only part of what she read, and would return to it at dinner, when the kitchen stove heated up the water for soup.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: She bought a newspaper at night time when she was reading it, each word on the page being read out. She understood half of what was written, but not all of it, and so on, until dinner time came and the water on the stove had boiled up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She got a part-time job as a journalist, and每周五下班时她都会将报纸放在家里的茶几上阅读。在这类的文字里，她都能听见其中的一部分，却还有一部分听不懂；当晚饭煮好后，她回家的火车就开进站了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She ordered a daily newspaper, which she read in the evening hours. She understood some of it, but not all of it, so she waited until dinner time before she could understand what was being said.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang Qiyao subscribed to a local newspaper and spent most of her evening reading it. She could understand only a limited amount, the rest was gibberish to her; but as she sat there reading, her stomach growled and the water on the stove boiled.

chinese: 那一条条一排排的里巷，流动着一些意料之外又清理之中的东西，东西不是什么大东西，但琐琐细细，聚沙也能成塔的。
english: Something is flowing through the longtang that is unpredictable yet entirely rational, small, not large, and trivial—but then even a castle can be made out of sand.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: The streets that run like a row of rows were littered with things that were unexpected but cleaned up in the end. The stuff wasn't big, but it was small enough to form a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: In these networks of longtang, things go about its assigned tasks without ever realizing it has been disrupted: no large items among them, but in truth桩件般的碎末总能形成小山河的小巧伟力。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit: Those rows of lanes moving with some unexpected but cleaned items. The things weren't big, but they were small enough to be collected together to form a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct-bnb-4bit(fin: Through these longtang flows a mixture of unexpected and unclean things; but then again, even the smallest dirt particle can, with just the right mixture of forces, form a sandstack.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: That row of rows of alleys flow with unexpected things like dirt or rubbish. There isn't anything big here, but it's a small thing that can be put together into a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Inside these networks of longtang, things run the skies of unexpected meaning, but it is precisely at these places where chaos emerges—the things that seem unmediated (like the streets themselves),聚集细流也不可小视,细粒之中蕴藏着精致的组织和深刻的内涵。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The narrow lanes, rows of them, were filled with some unexpected but clean things. They weren’t big things, but they were very small, like sand that could build a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The longtang—are they not a tidy bunch?蕴藏着一些意外之外的什么东西，清理这些意外之外的东西，其间流露出来的，其实是一股巨大的潮流。
